description: Popatlal realises that one of the waiters at the resort must be providing information to the main boss. Jethalal suggests that they should follow him to find more information about the gang.

name: Safed Kabootar
description: The main boss comes up with a new code word and prepares for an important meeting. Meanwhile, Jethalal meets the manager and tries to extract information about all the employees.

name: Jethalal's New Suspect
description: Popatlal and others keep their covers intact and steer clear from any suspicion. Jethalal also reveals the name of the person he thinks is the mole in the resort.

name: Popatlal Meets Sanjana
description: Popatlal is sure that the receptionist has more allies in the resort. He devises a plan to make sure they can catch them.

name: Popatlal Proposes To Sanjana
description: Popatlal sets a romantic mood to propose Sanjana. Little does he know that she is involved in the dealing of the medicines.

name: Popatlal Gets Caught
description: After revealing his true identity to Sanjana, Popatlal gets caught by the gang. She calls Popatlal to meet him and sets him up to get captured.

name: Popatlal Meets The Boss
description: Jethalal bumps into Sanjana and deals with her discreetly. Popatlal finally comes face to face with the boss of the gang.

name: Dulhe Ki Khatirdaari
description: The boss continues to torture Popatlal while his assistant checks for more clues. Jethalal plans to go through the CCTV footage to look for Popatlal in the resort.

name: Jethalal's New Cover
description: The boss discovers about Jethalal, who is Popatlal's accomplice. Jethalal, Bagha, and Bapuji take a new disguise to escape from the clutches of the gang.

name: Popatlal Waits For A Miracle
description: Popatlal waits for a miracle as he is tied in the pool and will be electrocuted if he tries to move. Jethalal is running around the resort in a disguise trying to look for Popatlal.

name: Police Arrives At The Resort
description: Jethalal, Bagha and Bapuji are still on the run from the goons at the resort. Soon, Inspector Chalu Pandey arrives at the resort to investigate the situation.

name: Jethalal Meets The Boss
description: Jethalal stumbles onto the boss of the operation and they find out that they are old acquaintances. Madan further tortures Popatlal who is still tied at the centre of the pool.

name: Pandey Maarega Dande
description: Jethalal, Babuji, and Bagha celebrate when they see that Inspector Pandey has arrived from Mumbai. They share all the information about the goons that they have.

name: Pandey Finds Clues
description: Inspector Pandey suspects that there must be a secret at the pool since it is closed for everyone. To their surprise, they find more clues linked to Popatlal there.

name: Popatlal Saved
description: Inspector Pandey finds Popatlal, who tells them how he escaped death. Inspector Pandey's men also catch hold of Madan.

name: Popatlal Gathers Evidence
description: Madan demands to be set free, as Popatlal does not have any proof against him. Popatlal manages to find a piece of video evidence that incriminates Madan.

name: Mission Kala Kauwa Completed
description: With Madan's arrest, Popatlal's top-secret mission is completed successfully. Popatlal and Jethalal also extend the services of Gokuldham's members to the Rang Tarang resort's owner.

name: Celebrating The Success
description: The colony members are in a festive mood as they celebrate the success of Popatlal's secret mission. Bhide and his wife consider going to a resort along with everyone else to congratulate Popatlal.

name: Gokuldham Plans A Party
description: Bagha puts Jethalal in the spotlight by asking him a hypothetical question. Everyone from Gokuldham calls Jethalal to show him the excitement for the celebration at the resort.

name: The Guest Of Honour
description: Popatlal and his gang get a 5-star treatment at the resort. Meanwhile, everyone at Gokuldham prepares to leave for Rang Tarang resort.

name: Gokuldham Prepares To Leave
description: Jethalal locks himself out of his room and has to wake up Bapuji to get in. Everyone from Gokuldham boards the bus to leave for the resort.

name: Bus Ride To The Resort
description: All members of the Gokuldham Society board the bus and begin their journey to Rang Tarang resort. They decide to have all the fun and take necessary precautions as well.

name: Games On The Bus
description: The families have a blast on the bus, playing different games and teasing each other on their way to Rang Tarang Resort.

name: Jethalal Prepares For Everyone's Arrival
description: Everyone on the bus decides to take a small break before proceeding further. Jethalal plans to get done with his meeting quickly so he can prepare for everyone's arrival.

name: The Fun Journey Continues
description: Everyone continues to play a variety of games throughout their journey. The gents plan to set up a grand party for Popatlal to celebrate his success.

name: The Journey Ends
description: Popatlal ensures that all his friends from Gokuldham receive a warm welcome at the resort. Jethalal reaches the owner's office for his meeting.

name: Gokuldham Waalo Ka Swaagat
description: Gokuldham members reach the resort reception and start checking themselves in. Popatlal plans to welcome them in a better way.

name: Party Bag Goes Missing
description: Jethalal finally gets to meet K.K. but faces issues in communication as he wants to converse in English. Sodhi and Iyer panic as they can't find the bag with party goods in it.

name: Walk Around The Resort
description: The gents of Gokuldham seek the manager's help in looking for Sodhi's missing bag. Everyone decides to take a walk around the resort together.

name: Roaming The Resort
description: Gokuldham members find a mango tree from which they pluck a few mangoes. They later discover the swimming pool area and are amazed by the ambiance.

name: Kadha For Everyone
description: Jethalal comes back from his meeting with KK. He tries to give Taarak Mehta a bottle of concoction.

name: Taarak Books A Hall
description: Taarak Mehta meets the manager of the resort to book a hall. Later, everyone gathers at the hall for a Gokuldham style function.

name: Sammaan Samaroh
description: All members of the Gokuldham Society gather at the hall. Bhide reveals to Jethalal and Popatlal the reason for their gathering.

name: Narrating The Mission
description: Dr Hathi, Jethalal and Popatlal narrate the details of Mission Kala Kauwa to all Gokuldham members.

name: Kala Kauwa Trophy
description: Jethalal continues to narrate every detail about their mission to everyone. Gokuldham members show their appreciation for Popatlal's efforts by giving him a trophy.

name: Party Sharty Ka Jugaad
description: All gents of the Gokuldham Society meet to discuss the party. They ask Popatlal to use his contacts for managing the party.

name: Gokuldham Dinner
description: Tapu Sena enjoys a game of pool in the play area. Everyone decides to meet up for a Gokuldham style dinner at the resort.

name: Party Sharty Start
description: Everyone gathers at the hall to enjoy a lavish dinner at the resort.

name: Bagha Loses Control
description: Bagha gets drunk and wants to keep dancing. Everyone tries to stop him and take him to his room.

name: Catching Bagha
description: Everyone tries different strategies to get Bagha to calm down and go back to his room. Bapuji finds out that Bagha is missing and gets furious.

name: Bagha Ke Liye Goli
description: Bapuji catches Bagha and scolds him for his behaviour. The resort's manager gets medicine to help Bagha come back to his senses.

name: Bapuji Finds The Bottle
description: Bapuji has a severe case of hiccups and decides to consume some 'kadha.' How will he react when he finds out the original contents of the bottle.

name: Bapuji Makes Everyone Dance
description: Bapuji punishes all the men of the Gokuldham Society for lying about the bottle. All the men later apologise for their plan to party.

name: Joshile Vs Mastane
description: Everyone is happy that they broke out of their regular lockdown routine to visit the resort. Jethalal and Taarak get into separate teams and play a game in the swimming pool.

name: Gokuldham Boat Race
description: Everyone relaxes in the swimming pool area of the resort. Later, everyone gathers at the lake and divide into teams to compete in a boat race.

name: Check Out From Resort
description: Everyone goes back to their rooms to rest after the boat race. The next morning, the Gokuldham members start checking out from the resort.

name: Leaving The Resort
description: Jethalal arrives late at the lobby for his check out. The owner of the resort sends a present to everyone for helping the resort.

name: Remembering The Trip
description: Anjali makes delicious dinner for Taarak as all the colony members meet at Mehta's residence and re-live their resort memories.

name: Right To Party
description: The men of the society sit around and remember the trip. They talk about the party incident and come to a conclusion that it is their right to party occasionally.

name: Remembering Dilip Kumar
description: The colony members get nostalgic and remember one of the icons of Indian cinema, Dilip Kumar. They cherish his memories by singing his songs.

name: A Healthy Diet
description: Everyone gets back to their daily routine and life goes back to normal in Gokuldham. Taarak gets to know that Anjali has plans for him and will only give him healthy food to eat.

name: Missing Glasses
description: Bapuji's glasses go missing and they are nowhere to be found. Where could his glasses be? Meanwhile, Taarak gets late for office.

name: Late For Work
description: Mr Mehta is running late for work, and there seems to be no available mode of travel for him. Jethalal, as usual, is running late, and Bhide is going in the opposite direction. How does Mr Mehta get to work in time?

name: The Empty Warehouse
description: Jethalal gets the shock of his life when he reaches his warehouse and finds that it is empty. He panics and calls Bagha but, he too is of no help. Jethalal decides to call Mr Mehta for help, who is in a tricky situation with his boss for coming late.

name: Saving Taarak
description: To get Mr.Mehta a day off from work, Jethalal calls Mr.Mehta's boss and pretends to be Anjali, who has fallen sick all of a sudden.

name: Magan Saves The Day
description: Jethalal and the society members celebrate the fact that the electronic stock was saved and nothing was stolen. Mr Mehta gets furious that because of Jethalal's misunderstanding he had to take a day off from work.

name: Taarak Gets Caught
description: Mr. Mehta's boss finds out that he lied and took a day off from work. He confronts him in the restaurant. Is Mr. Mehta's job in danger?

name: Taarak Ke Bahane
description: Taarak reaches home to discover that his wife is going to her friend's place. He is worried that he will have to lie to everyone who question him.

name: Jalebi Ke Sapne
description: Bapuji reminisces about his younger days with Tapu. Jethalal asks Baupuji to accompany him for a special breakfast.

name: Jalebi Ka Order
description: Jethalal asks Taarak to accompany him for a plate of 'Jalebi' and 'Fafda.' Bapuji does not allow Taarak to eat the 'Jalebi' that Tapu orders online.

name: Gokuldham Vaccination Drive
description: Dr Hathi reveals that he will be conducting a vaccination drive and helping everyone in the society to get their shots. Taarak and Jethalal get into a fight when Jethalal declares that he doesn't want to get vaccinated.

name: Publicity Plans
description: Bhide informs everyone that Popatlal will publish an article about the vaccination drive. Tapu Sena seeks the help of Ritu for advertising their new song.

name: The Sena's Vaccination Song
description: Jethalal and Taarak get into another quarrel as Jethalal has a new excuse for not taking the vaccine. Tapu Sena performs the vaccination song that they have been preparing with Taarak.

name: Convincing To Take A Shot
description: Bhide and Dr. Hathi are excited to make all the arrangements and start with their vaccination drive. Bhide finds out that Sodhi does not want to take the vaccination either.

name: Jethalal Ka Brahmastra
description: Everyone gets up early to prepare for the Gokuldham Vaccination Drive. Jethalal comes up with a clever plan to save himself from the needle.

name: Gokuldham Vaccinated
description: Everyone gathers at the camp and gets vaccinated for COVID-19. Taarak reveals that Jethalal isn't sick and is lying to escape the camp.

name: Jethalal Caught
description: After his lie gets caught, Jethalal runs away from everyone to save himself from the injection. He seeks Taarak's help to protect himself from the other members of Gokuldham.

name: Gokuldham Vaccination Rumours
description: With all the members of the society vaccinated, everyone prepares for outsiders to arrive for the vaccine. They are shocked when no one turns up for getting vaccinated.

name: Vaccination Drive Sabotaged
description: Tapu Sena finds that someone has taken all their vaccination drive banners down. Bhide calls for the police's help to catch the people spreading misinformation.

name: Colony Members Under Arrest?
description: Inspector Pandey comes to the colony to arrest the members for running a fake vaccination drive. Are the colony members in trouble?

name: Convincing People For Vaccination
description: As the misunderstanding around the vaccination drive clears out, the colony members decide to go out and convince people to come and get vaccinated.

name: Successful Vaccination Drive
description: The colony members celebrate the successful vaccination drive and find out that the people who had spread rumours have been caught.

name: Post Vaccine Effects
description: Jethalal has a sore arm and Tapu, a fever. Champaklal calls Dr Hathi over. Dr Hathi tactfully rids Jethalal of the sore arm. What will his solution for Tapu be?

name: Popatlal Returns From Hyderabad
description: Popatlal returns from Hyderabad. Bhide takes offline classes. His students are extremely happy to be back for offline classes. Meanwhile, Tapu Sena decides to meet to come up with ideas to celebrate Ganesh Chaturthi.

name: Bhide Wants To Plan Ganesh Utsav
description: Bhide has decided to plan for the Ganesh Utsav this year, instead of Tapu Sena. He tries to come up with a unique idea to celebrate Ganesh Utsav, but cannot think of anything. Who will plan the celebrations for Ganesh Utsav?

name: Bhide Prepares For Ganesh Utsav
description: Bhide speeds up his preparations for Ganesh Utsav and asks Iyer to meet him to decide the budget. Tapu Sena has also started their preparations for Ganesh Utsav, as they do every year. Will Bhide beat Tapu Sena's budget and get to prepare for Ganesh Utsav?

name: An Excited Bhide
description: Bhide believes he will beat Tapu Sena and get to organise the upcoming Ganesh Utsav. Everybody waits for Jethalal to reach the clubhouse so that the meeting can begin. Will Jethalal arrive on time?

name: Champaklal Comes Up With A Solution
description: The conflict between Tapu Sena and Bhide continues to ascertain who gets to prepare for the upcoming Ganesh Utsav. On seeing the argument escalate at the society meet, Champaklal intervenes and comes up with a solution that is accepted by all. Who will get to prepare for the upcoming Ganesh Utsav?

name: Ganesha's Message For Bhide
description: Bhide enumerates the names of Lord Ganesh. Later, he dreams of meeting Lord Ganesh himself, after following Mushak.

name: Aftermath Of Bhide's Dream
description: Bhide is at a loss for words because of his dream. He talks to various members of the Gokuldham Society about his dream and everybody tries to think of a way out.

name: Pandits Create Confusion
description: Popatlal takes Bhide to a Pandit so they can help Bhide understand his dream. They come back and call everyone to give an update about the situation.

name: Bappa Arrives At Gokuldham
description: Everyone gets ready to welcome Ganpati Bappa at the Gokuldham Society. Bhide gets anxious before Lord Ganesh arrives.

name: Bappa's Welcome
description: The members of Gokuldham Society welcome Lord Ganesh to their care. Bhide reveals the programmes he has planned with Tapu Sena for the celebrations.

name: Ranga Rang Karyakram
description: Sunderlal arrives at Jethalal's house with a deal. Bhide calls everyone to let them know about the programmes that are lined up for the celebration.

name: Independence Day At Gokuldham
description: The Gokuldham members are ready to start the Ganpati Utsav. To celebrate the 75th year of independence, everyone dresses up as the freedom fighters of India.

name: Ganesh Utsav Competition
description: Bhide takes the Ganesh Utsav forward at the Gokuldham Society. The members take turns to display their costumes.

name: The Patriots At Gokuldham
description: Sodhi, Taarak and Bhide put on their costumes and perform their acts. Everyone enjoys the visual and knowledgeable performances that the participants illustrate.

name: Insaan Se Insaan Jude
description: The spotlight lands on Anjali, Iyer, and Babita next. They put on their costumes and portray stories from India's freedom fighting days.

name: Tapu Sena's Combined Act
description: Impressed by the freedom fighters, everyone hopes that their spirit keeps inspiring our future generations. Members of Tapu Sena put up a joint performance for the society members.

name: Laut Ke Aayenge
description: It is finally Popatlal and Jethalal's turn to put on a show. Everyone has tears of joy as they bid farewell to Lord Ganesha.

name: Sakharam Buddha Ho Gaya
description: Bhide realises that his scooter has gotten old and needs extra care. He calls Sodhi hoping that he might know a mechanic who can help.

name: Sakharam Hua Chori
description: Everyone at the Gokuldham Society gets ready to go to their jobs. Someone suspicious walks into the society who has his eyes set on Bhide's Sakharam.

name: Sakharam Is Safe
description: Sodhi calls Bhide to tell him that he sent a mechanic to repair his scooter. Popatlal and Bapuji give Tapu Sena a small history lesson.

name: Bhide Needs Cash
description: Bhide needs hard cash that he has to give to Ramakant Kaka. Bhide decides to send Sonu, with Tapu Sena, to the bank to withdraw the money he needs.

name: Tapu Sena Loses The Cheque
description: Bhide hands the cheque to his daughter and asks Tapu Sena to head directly to the bank. After losing the cheque at the market, Tapu Sena frantically searches for it everywhere.

name: Bhide's Money Withdrawn
description: Tapu Sena returns to Gokuldham Society and lies to Bhide about his money. Bhide receives a message from his bank that money has been withdrawn from his account.

name: Bhide Finds The Cheque
description: Tapu Sena is in shambles due to the problem they have gotten themselves into. Bhide gets a call from an officer who tells him that he found his cheque lying on the road.

name: Paiso Ka Jugaad
description: Tapu Sena calls their parents and tries to borrow cash so they can give it to Bhide.

name: Tapu Sena Contacts A Loan Shark
description: Tapu Sena contacts a loan shark to help Sonu give the cash to her father. The loan shark informs them about his terms and conditions for lending them the money.

name: Tapu Sena Ki Complaint
description: Bhide plays along with the lies that Tapu Sena tells him. He decides to call their parents to tell them about their blunders.

name: Tapu Sena's Parents Meet
description: Abdul follows Tapu Sena and updates Bhide of their movement. Tapu Sena's parents gather at Bhide's house and find out about their lies.

name: Tapu Sena's Confession
description: Bhide gets enraged by the string of lies Tapu Sena has been telling and blames himself for being a poor teacher. Tapu Sena decides to tell the truth to their parents.

name: Bapuji Ka Saath
description: Bapuji tells Tapu Sena that he will always support them if they always stay on the right path. Bhide and Sodhi visit Ramakant Kama to hand him the money.

name: Bhide Ka Bhayanak Sapna
description: With Abdul missing from his shop, Bhide prepares soda for everyone. Bhide has a terrible nightmare that keeps disturbing his sleep.

name: Bhide's Midnight Scare
description: Bhide calls Sodhi and Jethalal for help in the middle of the night as he thinks there is some trouble at the door. Jethalal and Taarak carry any weapon they can get their hands on and rush to Bhide's home.

name: Popatlal's Fan Mail
description: Popatlal receives Kashmiri Kahwa from a fan and calls everyone to his home to have some. Bhide, who leaves his phone at home, looks for all his friends everywhere in the Gokuldham Society.

name: The Kahwa Party
description: Bhide gets Bapuji and everyone else's wives to Popatlal's home. They misunderstand the Kahwa to be an alcoholic beverage and begin to revolt against the drinkers.

name: Taarak Has 30 Minutes
description: Babita delivers Jethalal's letter to his home before he leaves for his shop. Taarak's boss gives him 30 minutes to find a birth certificate.

name: Taarak Ka Hathiyaar
description: The boss's wife calls the office to inform them that she has found the birth certificate. Taarak plans to use his best weapon to take his revenge.

name: Taarak's Poem
description: Taarak's boss asks him to read out his poem, but Taarak knows that reading his poem out, will get him in trouble.

name: Rootha Hua Jetha
description: After getting into more trouble at work, Taarak tries to seek Jethalal's help. However, an angry Jethalal takes his time to forgive Taarak and give him some advice.

name: Saving Taarak's Job
description: Jethalal calls Iyer and asks him to help save Taarak's job. Iyer reluctantly agrees to lie to Taarak's boss about the poem.

name: Iyer Gets Into Trouble
description: Taarak's boss calls Iyer and tells him that Iyer's boss is his childhood friend. Iyer calls Taarak to tell him about the trouble he has gotten himself into.

name: Sutli Bomb Jaisi Kavita
description: Jethalal forces Taarak to recite his poem in front of Anjali and Babita. Jethalal helps Iyer to calm down so they can find a solution for their problems.

name: Taarak And Iyer's Meeting
description: Taarak and Iyer reach the restaurant and wait for their bosses to arrive. Taarak's boss feels that it is his responsibility to counsel his childhood friend to become a better senior.

name: Democracy In The Office
description: Taarak's boss claims that there is democracy in his office and everyone is free to express their opinions. But how will he react when Taarak tells him that his 'Boss Bashing' poem was intended towards him?

name: Supporting The Small Shops
description: Jethalal narrates the incident about Taarak's boss to Bapuji. Madhvi requests the Mahila Mandal to shop from the local market to support the small businesses that had suffered due to COVID-19.

name: Diwali Shopping
description: Taarak writes a poem for the occasion of Diwali and requests Jethalal to hear it. The members of the Gokuldham Society visit the local market for Diwali shopping.

name: Helping The Needy
description: The police explain their reasons for raiding the roadside hawkers. Feeling bad about the situation, Mahila Mandal comes up with a solution that helps all the parties.

name: Permission For Stalls
description: The hawkers reach Gokuldham Society to set up their stalls. However, they need permission from Bhide, the society's secretary, before doing anything.

name: Permission Granted
description: Bhide, after consulting everyone, grants the hawkers permission to set up their stalls. Tapu Sena assures Bhide that they will take care of the security arrangements.

name: Tapu Sena On High Alert
description: The shopping fiesta begins at the Gokuldham Society. Tapu Sena catches a pickpocket, who tries to run away with a lot of valuable items.

name: Ahmedabad Se Surprise
description: Sundar arrives at Jethalalâ€™s house and tells him that he has brought a surprise from Ahmedabad. When Goli tells his father about the kachori, he wishes that he could have some as well.

name: Kachori Delivery
description: Goli tries to deliver his mother's handmade kachori to Iyer's house, but faces multiple hurdles along the way.

name: Jethalal - The Cricketer
description: Goli distributes kachoris to everyone in Gokuldham Society. Jethalal talks to Bapuji about his shopâ€™s interior work. Meanwhile, the kids are playing cricket downstairs and Jethalal flaunts his cricket skills in front of Babita.

name: Renovation At Gada Electronics
description: Taarak steps in and saves Jethalal from getting embarrassed in front of Babita. Jethalal, worried that his business is affected by the renovation, seeks Taarak's help again.

name: Iyer Trips And Falls
description: Taarak asks Jethalal to stay calm and ask his contractor for a deadline. Iyer trips on a banana peel and breaks his cell phone.

name: Pyaar Ki Kala
description: When Bhide finds that Tapu has ordered footwear worth five thousand rupees, he scolds Jethalal for pampering Tapu. Jethalal reaches his shop to find that the contractor hasn't arrived for the meeting.

name: Jethalal Se Vasooli
description: Jethalal sends Bagha to a local mobile repair show for fixing Babita's phone. Bhide has to deal with three guys who are adamant about taking 2 lakh rupees from Jethalal.

name: Jethalal Ke Office Aye Gunde
description: The goons, who believe that Jethalal owes them money, reach his office and demand money. Jethalal, still confused, tries to figure out who they are and how does he owe them money.

name: Searching For Santosh Contractor
description: Jethalal frantically looks for his contractor Santosh. He ends up calling multiple numbers but fails to get in touch with him. Meanwhile, Babita and Iyer wait for Jethalal to come back with her phone.

name: Finding Babita's Phone
description: Iyer calls Bagha and asks him about Babita's phone. Jethalal calls the vasooli agents and tries to get the phone back.

name: Retrieving Babita's Phone
description: Jethalal calls the goon who has Babita's phone and begs him to give the phone back to him. However, the goon doesn't budge and asks for his money. What compromise does Jethalal need to do to get the phone back?

name: Jethalal's Lies Get Caught
description: Iyer and Babita arrive at Jethalal's godown and find that he has been lying about Babita's phone all along. Jethalal turns to Taarak to help him find a solution.

name: Jethalal Ki Deal
description: Jethalal gets jumped on by other members of Gokuldham for being irresponsible with Babita's phone. Taarak helps Jethalal to set up a meeting with the vasooli agents.

name: Paise Do Phone Lo
description: Sodhi gets ready to take on the vasooli agents with Babita's phone. Jethalal sets up a meeting with the agents in the hopes of returning Babita's phone.

name: Jethalal Arrested
description: Jethalal, Taarak and Sodhi are arrested by the police and taken to the station. They get happy to see Inspector Pandey on duty but, he refuses to treat their case in a partial manner.

name: Jethalal And Gang In Lock-Up
description: Jethalal, Taarak and Sodhi get locked up in Inspector Pandey's station. They keep requesting Inspector Pandey to show them some leniency.

name: Jethalal Retrieves Babita's Phone
description: Jethalal requests Inspector Pandey to drop him, Taarak and Sodhi at Gokuldham Society. Bapuji finds out the story of Jethalal's arrest through Bhide.

name: Chappal Exchange
description: Babita thanks Jethalal for repairing and returning her phone safely. Jethalal argues about exchanging the footwear that Tapu ordered online.

name: Popatlal Ko Laga Jhatka
description: Popatlal gets angry at Bhide for being carefree about the accidents at the Gokuldham Society. How will the members of Gokuldham solve this new issue?

name: Madhvi Ki Keemti Saree
description: Madhvi informs Bhide that her brother, Vinayak, will be coming over with his family. Bhide gets distracted and burns Madhvi's saree by accident.

name: Bhide Gets Caught
description: Bhide is in a hurry to leave, but the people of Gokuldham keep coming in his way. Bhide has to hide as he runs into Madhvi and Sonu at the market.

name: Bhide Looks For A New Saree
description: A tailor suggests to Bhide that the best option he has is to buy the same saree. Bhide asks Taarak to help him find the saree.

name: Bhide Goes Saree Shopping
description: Bhide tries to find the same saree at the shops in the mall. Meanwhile, Madhvi calls Bhide, asking him about her saree.

name: Bhide Gets The Saree
description: Bhide buys a replica of Madhvi's Saree from a shop. He sneaks in with the saree and hides it in the cupboard.

name: Mama Mami Ka Swagat
description: Bhide and his family finally welcome Madhvi's brother to their house. Everyone notices that Madhvi's saree is different. Will Bhide come clean?

name: Bhide's Confession And Punishment
description: Sonu recites the poem she wrote for her Mama and Mami. Bhide confesses that it was him who burned Madhvi's saree.

name: An Invitation From Big B
description: Big B calls Asit Kumarr Modi and invites every member of the Gokuldham Society to play KBC. Asit relays the message to Bhide so he can inform everyone to get ready.

name: Gokuldham Ke Liye Khushkhabri
description: With Asit Kumarr Modi arriving in Gokuldham Society, what news is he bringing along with him, that has the interest of all the members?

name: KBC Se Invitation
description: Asit Ji announces that Gokuldham Society members have been invited to participate in Kaun Banega Crorepati. The society members can't control their excitement at the thought of participating in such a huge show and meeting Big B personally.

name: Yuva Unstoppable Foundation At Gokuldham
description: The members of the Gokuldham Society return home after their gameplay on the hot seat and congratulate each other. Everyone welcomes the people from Yuva Unstoppable Foundation.

name: Gokuldham's Eligible Partner
description: Shubh Mangal Marriage Bureau tells Popatlal that after his appearance on KBC, he has become the most eligible bachelor in the country. Abdul calls Popatlal to inform him that someone is coming over to see him.

name: Popatlal Ke Liye Do Rishte
description: Popatlal takes it upon himself to disinfect his house so he can meet Gungun. He gets in trouble when another family stops him on his way to Bhide's house.

name: Do Rishton Mein Phasa Popatlal
description: Popatlal drops the second family at Dr Hathi's house and meets Gungun, who is waiting at Bhide's house. Popatlal has to juggle between the two families before coming to a decision.

name: Popatlal Meets Sneha And Gungun
description: Popatlal uses a ladder to get up and down Bhide's balcony to meet both families. Who will Popatlal choose, Sneha or Gungun?

name: Gungun's Father Faints
description: It appears as Popatlal has made up his mind to marry Sneha, but when he declines Gungun's proposal, Gungun's father loses consciousness. How will this change Popatlal's selection criteria?

name: No Shaadi For Popatlal
description: Both families leave Gokuldham Society, revealing that they just wanted to invite the members of the Gokuldham Society to Sneha and Gungun's wedding. A furious Popatlal is calmed down by the Mahila Mandal with their optimism.

name: Toofani Astrologer
description: Popatlal, already on the edge, sends a family home, who genuinely came with a marriage proposal. Fuming with anger, he calls his boss and asks him about the astrologer who works for their paper.

name: Popatlal Meets A Vastu Expert
description: Popatlal explains to Bhide, Madhvi and Komal the reason for his happiness. Popatlal welcomes Sanjana, a Vastu expert, to the Gokuldham Society.

name: Giving The Sherwani Away
description: Popatlal, happy about getting rid of his cursed sherwani, is surprised by his pandit, who delivers his sherwani back to him. Popatlal appoints Tapu Sena to gift his sherwani to an unmarried guy.

name: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ Getting Rid Of The Sherwani
description: All the members of the Gokuldham Society get angry at Popatlal for throwing his sherwani on Bhide. When Bhide calls to confront him about his behaviour, Popatlal asks Bhide to get rid of the sherwani.

name: Popatlal Ki Sherwani Hai
description: Popatlal reveals that it was his sherwani, which angers other members of the society. Taarak throws a badminton challenge to Anjali hoping to eat the best street food.

name: Anjali Finds The Bills
description: Jethalal brings a hot breakfast for his friends and invites them to his house. Anjali finds a hotel bill amongst Taarak's things and seeks Babita's help to find answers.

name: Goli's Secret Mission
description: After feeling betrayed, Anjali decides to spy on Taarak. She bribes Goli to click a picture of Taarak eating in a hotel during his lunch break. Will Goli, the spy, accomplish his mission?

name: Khiladi Diet Plan
description: Anjali takes the help of Mahila Mandal with her husband's diet problem. Babita takes Anjali to a reputed dietician, who suggests a 'Khiladi Diet' for Taarak.

name: Diet Plan Shuru
description: After having a delicious meal cooked by Anjali, Taarak meets his friends at the soda shop. The next day Anjali surprises Taarak and Jethalal with a special halwa.

name: Taarak Doesn't Like His Surprise
description: Anjali reveals her surprise and gets into a fight with Taarak in Jethalal's presence. Goli feels responsible for the fight between the Mehtas and meets Taarak to apologise to him.

name: Taarak's Special Tiffin
description: Jethalal asks for more time when Taarak calls him seeking help to quench his appetite for delicious food. Taarak's boss forces him to exchange tiffins so he can get out of eating diet food.

name: Taarak Gets Tired Of His Diet
description: Taarak tries to seek everyone's help to find better food without Anjali finding out about it. Anjali gets worried when Taarak does not return home in time.

name: Taarak Found In A Kabristan
description: All members of the Gokuldham Society put their heads together to find Taarak. Taarak arrives late in the night in a rickshaw from a cemetery. What was he doing at the cemetery?

name: Karele Wali Ki Jaan
description: Taarak comes to his senses when he hears the mention of 'karela'. He narrates the story of the 'karela wali' he met on his way home.

name: Karele Ka Bhoot
description: The Mahila Mandal joins forces to help Anjali take care of Taarak. An eerie vibe takes over Gokuldham as everyone starts having visions of a ghost in the society.

name: Gokuldham Mein Bhoot Ka Darr
description: Everyone leaves for their home after Taarak has a good homecooked dinner and takes his medicine. The ghost story told by Taarak gives birth to fear in everyone's mind. How will the members of Gokuldham Society overcome their fears?

name: Taarak Celebrates With Tapu Sena
description: The Mahila Mandal, worried about Taarak, asks Anjali to give him his favourite delicacies till he gets better. Taarak celebrates with Tapu Sena after their plan succeeds.

name: Karele Ka Kuan
description: Tapu Sena and Taarak enjoy their moment of victory by having some delicious food. As Anjali prays to god to help her family, Taarak worries that soon his lies will be caught.

name: Taarak's Day Off
description: Anjali calls Taarak's boss and asks him to give her husband the day off. The dietician arrives at Gokuldham Society to check on the Mehtas.

name: Psychiatrist For Taarak
description: Taarak sees a cart carrying 'karela' into the Gokuldham Society and loses his composure. Dr Hathi calls a psychiatrist to help with Taarak's condition. What is wrong with Taarak?

name: Meeting For Taarak's Health
description: All members of the Gokuldham Society meet to find a solution for Taarak's condition. After the psychiatrist fails to help, Babita suggests taking help from a Baba.

name: Taarak Fears The Shock Treatment
description: Tapu Sena tries to convince Bhide and Bapuji to stop the Baba from coming to Gokuldham. The Mahila Mandal visits the Mehtas to support them by getting some food for Taarak.

name: Baba Bhagayega Bhoot
description: Bhide lies to his customers, neighbours and students to keep the news of Taarak's 'bhoot' coming out. Choodi Wala Baba makes his preparations to help exorcise the ghost inside Taarak.

name: Baba Ki Rasmein
description: The 'Choodi Wale Baba' performs his rituals to exorcise the ghost inside Taarak. Taarak and Tapu Sena struggle to find a way out from the mess they have gotten themselves in.

name: Bottle Khul Chuki Hai
description: The Baba claims that Madhavi is now hosting the spirit of Suryamukhi. He later explains to everyone how he is going to exorcise the ghost inside Taarak.

name: Taarak's Scam
description: Taarak sends everyone in shock when he reveals that he has been acting all along. Bapuji accuses Jethalal of being an accomplice in Taarak's drama. Taarak apologises to everyone for fooling them over the last few days.

name: Anjali Is Heartbroken
description: The Choodi Wale Baba reveals that it was just an act that he performed as directed by Anjali. The members of the Gokuldham Society help Taarak and Anjali to solve their diet problem.

name: Taarak Makes Things Right
description: To redeem Gokuldham's image, Popatlal tells everyone that he wants to publish the truth about Taarak. Anjali reminds her husband that he has to deal with his boss, whom he spooked earlier.

name: Preparation For A Potential Client
description: Bagha helps Jethalal get rid of the stiffness in his body by helping him stretch. They decide to decorate the godown, to make it presentable for hosting an important client meeting.

name: Jethalal's Sleepless Night
description: Anxious about his client meeting, Jethalal has trouble falling asleep. He takes his father's blessings and meets his Gokuldham friends before leaving for his godown.

name: Godown Ki Chaabi
description: Bagha and Jethalal arrive at the godown early in the morning only to realise that they do not have the keys to the door. Jethalal reaches home and finds out that Bapuji isn't there. Will Jethalal reach his godown in time?

name: Bapuji Aur Jethalal Ka Miscommunication
description: Jethalal reaches his godown to find that Bapuji is waiting with the keys in the Gokuldham Society. Bhide agrees to help by offering to drive Bapuji to the godown.

name: Sakharam Gets Stopped By The Police
description: Bhide and Bapuji get in trouble when a lady gets hit by Sakharam. Jethalal starts getting anxious as he can't enter the godown, and the time for his meeting ticks closer.

name: Harr Disha Se Museebat
description: Bapuji fails to find Bagha in the meeting spot and goes looking around for him. Bagha finds Bhide, who gets fined again for breaking the traffic rules while searching for Bapuji.

name: Bapuji Welcomes The Client
description: Jethalal and Bhide rush back to Gokuldham to check if Bapuji returned home. Jethalal comes back to the godown to find Bapuji and his client having a good time.

name: Order Mila Bapuji Ki Wajah Se
description: Mr Goyal gets extremely happy to spend time with Bapuji and tells Jethalal that he will be given all the orders. The men of the Gokuldham Society meet at the soda shop and discuss who amongst them should leave the society.

name: Jethalal Ka Important Email
description: Bagha calls Jethalal to inform him that they failed to read their work emails today. However, Bagha fails to relay the message which makes Jethalal lose his mind.

name: More Orders For Gada Electronics
description: Babita informs Jethalal that her friend will visit his shop later. Jethalal promises his friends a party after he finalises a new deal that is coming his way.

name: Jethalal's Party Confirmed
description: Bagha calls Jethalal to the godown early, so nothing goes wrong in their meeting. With time in their hands, Jethalal, Taarak and Sodhi decide to have a lavish breakfast.

name: Jethalal Ki Imandari
description: The members of Gokuldham, worried about Jethalal, call to check on him. Jethalal's meeting with the Wow Resort's manager goes south when he puts forward an unreasonable demand.

name: Jethalal Ki A1 Soch
description: Wow Resort's manager reveals that he was testing the kind of businessman Jethalal is and finalises the deal. Jethalal takes all his friends on a conference call to give them the good news.

name: Party Kab Aur Kaha Hogi
description: Jethalal and Bagha prepare the godown to welcome his Gokuldham friends. Soon, everyone arrives at the godown to discuss when and where to organise Jethalal's success party.

name: Party Location Fixed
description: Popatlal agrees to host Jethalal's success party at his flat but puts forward a condition. Everyone tries to find a way to convince their wives to allow them for a boys' night out.

name: Jethalal's Mission Permission
description: Jethalal returns to the society early so he can take permission from Komal and Madhvi for the party. Will he manage to convince them to allow their husbands for a night out?

name: Mission Permission Ka Teesra Padhav
description: Jethalal calls Bhide to tell him that Madhvi has permitted him to have a night out. However, everyone gets worried as Jethalal has to request Roshan and Babita, who are known to be very strict. Will mission permission be a success?

name: Mehfil-E-Jaam Mein Jaane Ki Ijaazat
description: Jethalal returns to his godown being the bearer of bad news that Anjali has denied Taarak permission to attend the party. Taarak decides to call his beloved wife to get her permission in a different way. Will Jethalal and the gang get to celebrate his success together?

name: Party Sharty Ki Taiyari
description: With everyone's wives permitting them to join the party, Jethalal orders an expensive bottle for them to enjoy. Now, the only thing that remains is Bapuji's permission.

name: Bapuji Is Fed Lies
description: Jethalal lies to Bapuji and leaves for Popatlal's home to attend the party. However, Bapuji catches Jethalal in the society with the bottle of alcohol. Will the boys be able to party in peace?

name: Party Ka Maza
description: Jethalal manages to sneak into Popatlal's house so they can begin their party. The Mahila Mandal sends an important video message to their husbands, who decided to party separately.

name: Party Ka Popat
description: The men get excited and share poetry to get their party started. All their hopes go down the drain when Jethalal drops and breaks the bottle. Will they have the party that they worked so hard for?

name: Yeh Chappal Jethia Ki Chappal Jaisi Hai
description: Champaklal confronts the male members of the society after hearing the commotion caused by Sodhi and Popatlal. With nowhere else to go for the party-sharty, Sodhi comes up with an idea, but will this plan work out?

name: Aur Risk Nahi Le Sakte
description: The men of Gokuldham Society flee their party set up on the pavement when they hear the siren of a police car. The dejected men return to join the Mahila Mandal at their party.

name: Bagha's Attempt To Create A Diversion
description: All the male members of the Gokuldham Society remain disheartened because of their failed plans. Later, Champaklal is on the verge of finding out about Jethalal's party sharty.

name: Bhide Aur Popatlal Ki Ladai
description: Popatlal and Bhide argue with each other over garbage issues in society. Bhide plays a prank on Popatlal which angers him and he decides to take his revenge.

name: Popatlal Apologises To Bhide
description: Popatlal apologises to Bhide in order to seek help regarding his KYC. Later, inspite of being asked to return home early by his mother, Goli takes several detours with Gogi.

name: A New Tappu Sena Member
description: Gogi and Goli find a lost and homeless kitten in the park. With no other option in mind, they decide to take the kitten home for its safety. What will happen now?

name: House For Kitty
description: Tapu Sena struggles to find a house for Kitty. They contemplate taking it to their house but are worried about how their parents will react. Will they find a house for Kitty?

name: Bad News Hain
description: Goli's parents do not allow keeping Kitty at their house. Tapu and Sonu go to Popatlal's house with hopes. Will he keep Kitty at his house?

name: Tapu's Plan For Kitty
description: Tapu Sena is looking for Kitty, but she is nowhere to be found. Tapu comes up with a plan to keep Kitty in the society, which involves convincing Bhide. Will Bhide get convinced?

name: Billi Ne Kiya Nuksaan
description: Bhide and the other society members get annoyed at the fact that a cat was causing destruction to property in the colony and they look for the elusive cat. Meanwhile, the children of the society decide to let Kitty go before the adults get angry.

name: Box Hil Raha Hai
description: Tapu scares Bhide, who entered the clubhouse while Goli, Gogi and Sonu try to sneak out a few items from their respective houses for Kitty. Will Tapu Sena succeed in hiding Kitty?

name: Abdul's Hunt For The Kitten
description: Bhide questions Goli, Gogi and Sonu as they return to the clubhouse. Later, Goli tries to keep Abdul deviated, as he searches the clubhouse for the cat. Will Abdul find out about Pom Pom?

name: Abb Ladka Dekhne Nahi Jaa Sakte
description: With Abdul on their side, Tapu Sena celebrates Pom Pom staying at the clubhouse. Later, the family that arrives at Gokuldham Society, to meet Popatlal, refuses to step any further after Pom Pom crosses their path.

name: Billi Ka Problem
description: A worried Abdul tells Taarak and Anjali that Pom Pom, the kitten, has scared away Popatlal's guests. Tapu Sena hides her at their clubhouse. What will happen when Popatlal finds out?

name: Popatlal Ke Andar Ka Sher
description: In the light of recent events, Popatlal forces Bhide to resign from the post of secretary. Everyone tries to calm Bhide and Popatlal, who won't stop fighting.

name: Bapuji's Cat Allergy
description: With Popatlal hell-bent on getting rid of the cat, Tapu Sena comes up with a plan to save her. Popatlal suggests that they use Bapuji as a cat detector to find Pom Pom.

name: Billi Ka Darr
description: Everyone at Gokuldham society is worried about the situation caused by the cat. Goli sneaks out in the middle of the night to check on Pom Pom.

name: Bhide Bhagayega Billi
description: Dr Hathi and Komal wake up to realise that Goli is missing from the house. Abdul prevents Bhide from entering the clubhouse where Pom Pom is kept hidden by Tapu Sena.

name: Bhide Wants The Box
description: Sonu calls Tapu to inform him that her father is on his way to get the box in which Pom Pom resides. Everyone believes Abdul's lie that Gokuldham is now cat-free. What will Tapu Sena do when their lies are caught?

name: Apshagun Kuch Nahi Hai
description: Popatlal shows his appreciation for Bhide's quick action to make the society cat-free. Abdul and Tapu Sena worry about their situation after lying to the members of Gokuldham.

name: Chasing Pom Pom Around
description: Tapu Sena frantically chases Pom Pom around Gokuldham Society. Pom Pom, who is in a playful mood, sneaks into one flat after another. Will it get caught?

name: Billi Ne Dilaya Sodhi Ko Gussa
description: Pom Pom enters Sodhi's house and breaks his bottles, and eats Roshan's cupcakes. He gets furious and confronts Bhide and Abdul about the cat. Will Tapu Sena's lies get caught?

name: Billi Gokuldham Mein Hi Hai
description: Everyone gets shocked when Popatlal informs them that his guests will soon arrive. Tapu Sena finds out that Pom Pom has made its way to Popatlal's house through the terrace.

name: Pom Pom In Popatlal's House
description: With Popatlal out to find a bouquet for his guests, Pom Pom wreaks havoc in his house. Tapu Sena enlists Abdul's help to get into Popatlal's house to retrieve Pom Pom. Will they manage to hide Pom Pom before Popatlal returns?

name: Ladkiwalo Ka Swagat
description: Popatlal asks Bhide to join him in welcoming his guests to the Gokuldham Society. Tapu Sena runs into multiple problems while looking for Pom Pom. Will Popatlal's meeting go smoothly?

name: Rishta Nikla Haath Se
description: Popatlal's guests get furious when they spot Pom Pom and leave Gokuldham in anger. Popatlal feels betrayed and is out to get his revenge. Will Tapu Sena come forward with the truth?

name: Tapu Sena Ki Billi
description: Tapu Sena tells everyone about how they adopted Pom Pom. Popatlal realises his anger is misdirected and expresses his gratitude to everyone for saving him from a superstitious family.

name: Pom Pom Ka Parivar
description: The Gokuldham family band together to find Pom Pom so they can welcome her to the society. However, they find Pom Pom with a group of other cats and decide to let them be together.

name: Permission For Lonavala Trip
description: Sonu gets scared to ask her father for permission to visit Lonavala with Tapu Sena. The men of the Gouldham Society meet at Abdul's shop and talk about Tapu Sena's absence from the society.

name: Bapuji Talks To Himself
description: The men of the Gokuldham Society sit at the soda shop and discuss their lives. Bhide and Madhavi spot Bapuji talking to himself on his balcony.

name: Bapuji Ka Jigri
description: Bapuji's childhood friend calls him out of the blue and invites him for a night out. Popatlal invites Jethalal, who will be alone, to his house for dinner.

name: Busy Day At Gada Electronics
description: Bagha declines Babita's call on Jethalal's phone as he was preoccupied with a client call. Popatlal and Babita put Jethalal in a spot where he has to decide at whose house will he have dinner. Who will Jethalal choose?

name: Bapuji Goes Out To Party
description: Jethalal comes home early to return Babita's mixer grinder and see Bapuji off. Jethalal and Popatlal enjoy a lavish feast together.

name: A Walk To Matka Shop
description: Everyone takes an evening walk to visit a kulfi store after their dinner. Sodhi returns from his party and is desperate to tell Jethalal what he saw.

name: Sodhi Ka Sachh
description: After Sodhi tells everyone what he saw, Jethalal refuses to believe him. Sodhi narrates everything that happened and tries to convince them.

name: No One Believes Sodhi
description: When no one believes his story, Sodhi convinces everyone to sniff Bapuji to find out the truth. After finding no trace of alcohol from Bapuji, the members of the society force Sodhi to apologise.

name: Party Sharty Ke Lakshan
description: Bapuji complains about a headache and acidity to Jethalal. All the men of Gokuldham Society gather at Jethalal's house to take care of Bapuji.

name: Bapuji Gets Left Alone
description: Jethalal has to leave Bapuji alone as he has to visit Pune for a client meeting. Bapuji forces him to stay in Pune for the night. What could Bapuji be up to?

name: Following Bapuji
description: To prove he is right, Sodhi and Popatlal decide to follow Bapuji. After witnessing Bapuji's actions, Sodhi and Popatlal refuse to believe their eyes.

name: Bapuji Doing Party Sharty
description: Sodhi and Popatlal follow Bapuji into a bar. They call everyone so that they can see the truth with their own eyes.

name: Recording Bapuji's Actions
description: Sodhi and Popatlal tell everyone what they saw at the bar. They hide in the garden and record Bapuji entering the society in a drunken state.

name: Proof Against Bapuji
description: The men of Gokuldham worry about how to break the news of Bapuji's night out to Jethalal. Jethalal returns from his meeting and suspects that all his friends are hiding something from him.

name: Toofaan Aa Gaya Hai
description: Jethalal returns from his client meeting in Pune to discover that Bapuji is still unwell. Taarak gathers everyone at Popatlal's house so they can plan and break the news of Bapuji's nightly escapades to Jethalal.

name: Beta Baap Ko Kaise Toke?
description: Jethalal gets shocked when he finds out about Bapuji's drinking habit. Everyone discusses how they can help Bapuji get rid of his addiction.

name: Jethalal Fails To Confront Bapuji
description: Jethalal struggles to confront Bapuji about his drinking habit. He goes back to his friends, seeking help for the same.

name: Sodhi Ka Secret Plan
description: Sodhi locks Jethalal in a room and comes up with a secret plan to confront Bapuji. The Mahila Mandal gets shocked when they find out about Bapuji's activities.

name: Sodhi's Plan Backfires
description: Bapuji introduces his childhood friends to the Purush Mandal and comes clean about his actions. All of Jethalal's friends try to keep Bapuji away from a drunk Jethalal.

name: Jethalal In Trouble
description: Bapuji clears all the confusion about his newfound habit. However, the issue of a drunk Jethalal still persists. Can Jethalal's friends get him out of this mess before Bapuji finds out?

name: Jethalal Back To His Senses
description: Dr Hathi gets medicine for Jethalal that will bring him back to his senses. Bapuji gets extremely angry at the Purush Mandal for handling the situation poorly. How will everyone manage to calm Bapuji?

name: Bapuji's Social Service
description: Bapuji clears everyone's misunderstanding about his nightly escapades. The Purush Mandal apologises to Bapuji for accusing him of drinking without confronting him.

name: Godown Mein Chori
description: Sonu returns from her Lonavala trip bearing gifts for her parents. Jethalal tells about his eventful day to his friends while sipping soda at Abdul's shop.

name: False Alarm
description: Jethalal apologises to Inspector Pandey for the misinformation he had, due to which he had to call the police. To bring about some change, Jethalal decides to prepare soda for his friends by himself.

name: Bhangaar Wala Aya
description: Everyone at Gokuldham is dealing with the problem of having too much old stuff at home. Bhola Bhai comes to the rescue to collect the 'Bhangaar' from everyone's homes.

name: Amulya Virasat
description: Bhide stops Madhavi from giving away his prized possession to the 'bhangar wala'. When Jethalal brings Bhide's old music system for repair, Bagha gets worried about the situation.

name: Sargam Orchestra Repaired
description: Bagha tells Jethalal how he managed to repair Bhide's tape recorder. Bhide asks Abdul to gather everyone at the clubhouse so they can enjoy some old music together.

name: The Tape Recorder Works
description: When Bhide tries to turn on his music system, it does not work. Bagha uses all his skills to figure out the problem so everyone can sing and dance to old Bollywood music.

name: Golden Memories
description: The members of Gokuldham Society continue to enjoy old Bollywood songs at the clubhouse. Everyone appreciates the soulful music of that era.

name: Dancing To Old Songs
description: The members of Gokuldham Society continue to sing along and dance to their favourite old songs. They reminisce and talk about the famous singers and songwriters of the yesteryears.

name: Music Ka Dose
description: All members of the Gokuldham Society thank Bhide for a memorable musical night. Everyone returns home in a happy and fun mood.

name: Nimbu Ki Keemat
description: Bapuji watches the news to find out that the price of lemons has shot up. Meanwhile, Bhide receives an order for lime pickles. How will Bhide manage to complete this order?

name: Life Gives No Lemons
description: Bhide reaches a dead end while trying to procure the money that his clients owe him. Meanwhile, everyone at Gokuldham society struggles to find lemons. Will Bhide and Madhvi manage to fulfil the order?

name: Bappa Ki Delivery
description: Bhide, under immense stress, almost runs over Popatlal with his Sakharam. Later, a mysterious delivery van drops three sacks at Bhide's residence. What could it be?

name: Lemons For Bhide
description: Jethalal advises Bhide to get rid of the lemons before he gets in trouble with the police for hoarding them. Madhvi realises that the delivery of the lemons was meant for them.

name: Nimbu Wali Lottery
description: Bhide and Madhvi decide to sell the remaining lemons at a lower price. They fail to find a suitable buyer for the large number of lemons they have left. Who will buy them?

name: Nimbu Ka Kya Karein?
description: After Jethalal finds out that Bagha is planning to sell lemons, they quickly return them to Bhide before getting in trouble for hoarding. Bhide gets worried about what to do with the lemons. Will he find a solution?

name: Finding Buyers
description: Bhide goes on a calling spree, trying to find a buyer for his lemons. However, most people either don't believe him or aren't interested in his offer. Will Bhide manage to get rid of the stock of lemons?

name: Deal With A Jamakhor
description: As Bhide goes to meet the mysterious man who is interested in buying his entire stock of lemons, he gets stopped by the police. The police try to arrest him first but soon realise that the main culprit here is the 'Jamakhor' who called Bhide. Can they nab this public hoarder?

name: Catching The Jamakhor
description: After Guddu Khatila dodges the police, he provokes Sodhi and Bhide. Guddu's men try to catch Sodhi and Bhide to get revenge on them for calling the police. Will Inspector Pandey arrive in time to save them?

name: Thought Of The Day
description: The Purush Mandal enjoys a glass of lemon soda at Abdul's shop. Jethalal reminds Bhide about writing the thought of the day on the board.

name: Madhvi Gets Upset
description: Bhide angers Madhvi with his antics. Popatlal arrives at Bhide's house and offers him to help cheer Madhvi up. However, Bhide refuses and decides to turn Madhvi's frown into a smile by himself.

name: Group Shopping
description: The Mahila Mandal shops for vegetables together at the cart in the morning. They get excited after hearing Bhide's plan to shop at the mall and try to convince their husbands to take them to the sale. Will the Purush Mandal agree?

name: Notice For Bhide
description: All the couples of Gokuldham Society get together and set out to shop at the mall. A postman shows up at the society looking for Bhide. Will Bhide arrive in time to collect his letter?

name: Popatlal Ki Galat Information
description: Popatlal joins Babita and Iyer for breakfast. They find out that the marriage bureau had the wrong information about Popatlal. How will Popatlal handle the situation?

name: Popatlal Ka Toota Phone
description: Popatlal takes Bhide's help to rush to Jethalal's shop so he can get his phone repaired. Bagha helps with a replacement phone for Popatlal. Will Popatlal receive the call he has been waiting for?

name: Waiting For Pratiksha
description: Popatlal gets tired of waiting for Pratiksha and asks the marriage bureau for her contact number. To kill time, Popatlal reads Pratiskha's bio with Tapu Sena.

name: Pratiksha Ka Invitation
description: Popatlal gets an invitation from Pratiksha to meet her. He requests all his friends to get dressed in yellow and come along with him.

name: Rishte Ka Dress Code
description: Popatlal convinces everyone at Gokuldham to get dressed in a dress code. Everyone wears yellow and gets ready to meet Pratiksha and her family.

name: Searching For Pratiksha
description: Sodhi arranges a minibus for the Gokuldham members to travel together to Pratiksha's house. However, they face some difficulty in finding where she lives. Will they manage to find her?

name: Meeting Pratiksha's Family
description: The Gokuldham members are greeted by Mr Puri's secretary. Everyone introduces themselves to Pratiksha's family.

name: Popatlal Meets Pratiksha
description: Babita suggests that Popatlal and Pratiksha should talk to each other in private. Jethalal gives his phone number to Mr Puri before the Gokuldam family takes their leave.

name: Popatlal Gets Anxious
description: Popatlal expresses his gratitude to everyone for accompanying him.  He has trouble falling asleep as he feels anxious about the Puri family's thoughts about him.

name: Popatlal Ki Neend
description: Popatlal wakes Sodhi and Bhide as he is unable to sleep due to a dog barking. Sodhi arranges for a medicine that will help Popatlal to sleep.

name: Popatlal Kaha Hai?
description: The colony members are excited to get Popatlal ready for his meeting with his to-be wife. Popatlal however, isn't opening his door nor is he answering his phone. Where could Popatlal be?

name: Popatlal Gayab Hai
description: Everyone gathers in Jethalal's house to wait for Mr Puri's phone call. However, Popatlal is nowhere to be found. Where could he be?

name: Rishte Ke Liye Haan Hai
description: The Puri family calls Popatlal to tell him that they want Pratiksha to get married to him. However, they also reveal a shocking fact about Pratiksha's past. Will Popatlal look past it and accept the Puri family's proposal?

name: Shagun Dene Ki Taiyari
description: All members of the Gokuldham Society get ready to meet the Puri family and give them the shagun. Sodhi arranges a bus for the Gokuldham family to travel together.

name: Pratiksha Se Sawal
description: The Gokuldham family makes a grand entry into the Puri family's mansion. After Pratiksha shows up, Popatlal asks her an important question. What answer will Popatlal receive?

name: Pratiksha Ka Pyar
description: Popatlal reveals that he knows who Pratiksha is in love with. He later asks Pratiksha to give her final decision. Will Popatlal receive the answer he wants to hear?

name: Twist In The Tale
description: Popatlal gets in touch with Pratiksha's ex-husband and informs him about the wedding. What drama will unfold when Paresh lands up at the venue?

name: Pratiksha Aur Paresh Ka Milan
description: With Popatlal and Bapuji's help, Pratiksha and Paresh reconcile their love. Babita and Anjali play a friendly game of badminton.

name: Jethalal And Babita's Badminton Match
description: Jethalal and Babita's badminton match begins. Jethalal reaches home late and finds Bapuji sleeping on the couch.

name: Bhide's Mango Consignment
description: Bhide receives a consignment of mangoes. He distributes it among his friends for everyone to enjoy.

name: Rumours About Gada Electronics
description: Jethalal finds out that the daily newspaper did not get delivered in the morning. Later, he gets a piece of annoying news about his shop. What could it be about?

name: Contractor Gives The Good News
description: Jethalal shares his worries about his shop with Sodhi, Bhide and Popatlal. Later, when Jethalal meets his contractor, he receives a piece of good news. What could it be?

name: Meeting Pandit Ji
description: Jethalal invites a famous astrologer to help him find the most auspicious time to re-open his shop. What suggestions will this astrologer give?

name: Inauguration Ki Taiyyari
description: Jethalal invites friends and family over for the re-opening of his shop. Will everything go smooth for Jethalal?

name: Sundar's Promise
description: Jethalal is excited about his shop's reopening and invites all his neighbours and friends. Meanwhile, Sundar promises to bring Daya back to the colony for the reopening.

name: Kya Daya Ka Aana Cancel?
description: Sundar gets into a dilemma as he struggles to gather the courage and tell Jethalal that Daya won't be turning up for the inauguration. Meanwhile, a famous newspaper editor pays a visit to Gokuldham society.

name: Mehmaano Ko Aamantran
description: Jethalal invites all his friends and asks them to get to the venue on time. Meanwhile, Bagha creates a special list for Jethalal to personally call and invite. Will they accept his invitation?

name: Jethalal Ke Liye Gift
description: The members of Gokuldham try to think of a thoughtful gift for Jethalal on the occasion of his shop's reopening. What will they get him?

name: Dukaan Ready Hogayi
description: Jethalal gives an invitation to all his friends for the reopening of his shop. Meanwhile, Sundar comes up with a plan to get Daya for the shop reopening. How will he manage that?

name: Daya Bhabhi Ka Intezaar
description: Jethalal eagerly waits for his wife and can't contain his excitement. Can Sundar deliver his promise?

name: Daya Ki Chitthi
description: Jethalal comes to know that Daya won't be coming to Gokuldham for the shop's reopening. How will Jethalal react to this heartbreaking news?

name: Inauguration Ka Josh
description: The Gokuldham society members are elated and excited to be a part of the reopening of Gada Electronics. Will the event go as planned?

name: Bapuji Hue Gayab
description: Bhide tells Jethalal that he is unable to find Bapuji in the temple. Jethalal decides to report to Inspector Pandey that Bapuji has gone missing. Where could Bapuji have gone?

name: New Shop Opened
description: Bapuji inaugurates the renovated Gada Electronics shop in the nick of time as everyone celebrates Jethalal's happiness.

name: New Shop New Beginning
description: Jethalal apologises to Inspector Pandey for failing to inform him that Bapuji wasn't missing. Jethalal and Bagha get excited to begin working in their new shop.

name: Sundar's Business Proposal
description: Sundar gives Jethalal a business proposition. How will Jethalal respond to the proposal?

name: Goli Ne Todi Jethalal Ki Khidki
description: Goli accidentally breaks Jethalal's window while playing cricket. Will Jethalal get consumed in anger or forgive Tapu Sena?

name: Jethalal Surprises Tapu Sena
description: To cheer Tapu Sena after the accident in the morning, Jethalal surprises them with a thoughtful gift. They return the favour by treating Jethalal with his favourite savouries.

name: Dost Ki Help
description: Jethalal's friend asks him for financial help, which he agrees to provide. However, Jethalal finds out that he does not have that money with him. How will he help his friend?

name: Cheque Nahi Cash
description: Bagha collects five lakh rupees cash from Mr Deepak and gets it to the shop safely. However, Bapuji informs Jethalal that they have to leave early for a birthday party.

name: Peti Ke Andar Peti
description: Bagha takes the help of Magan to secure the cash kept at the shop. However, Bagha's troubles get doubled as Jethalal gets stuck at a birthday party.

name: Gada Electronics Mein Chor
description: Jaggu wakes Jethalal in the middle of the night to tell him that someone is trying to rob his shop. How will Jethalal save his shop?

name: Pandey Ji Ka Case
description: Inspector Pandey makes sure that he has all the information before taking any action. Will he manage to solve the case?

name: Nattu Kaka Ka Hukkum
description: The thief reveals that he was ordered by Nattu Kaka to help Jethalal. After Jethalal requests Inspector Pandey to let the thief go, Pandey Ji decides never to accept any case from the residents of Gokuldham Society.

name: Naye Nattu Kaka Ka Swagat
description: The new Nattu Kaka is the first to arrive at the shop and makes a grand entry. Jethalal and Bagha welcome him to their family with open arms.

name: Soda Ka Main Sponsor
description: Jethalal treats all his friends to a soda party at Abdul's shop. Popatlal catches Bhide for not being able to come up with a thought for the day.

name: Bittu Kaun Hai?
description: Everyone discusses what should be an appropriate thought for the day. A mysterious boy enters the Gokuldham Society and claims to know Sodhi. Who could it be?

name: Bittu Ki Mushkilein
description: Sodhi raises his concerns about Bittu's suspicious behaviour. Bittu opens up about the troubles he is facing at school and home. How will Sodhi deal with the situation?

name: Bittu Ki Zimmedari
description: Bittu threatens to run away if he gets forced to continue studying. He later helps Sodhi at his garage. Has Bittu found his passion?

name: Bittu's Day Out
description: Nattu Kaka comes up with a marketing plan to increase sales for Gada electronics. Meanwhile, Sodhi takes Tapu Sena and Bittu to a mall.

name: Bittu Ka Future
description: Due to the rains, Bhide shifts the soda meeting to the clubhouse. Bhide convinces everyone to take responsibility for helping Bittu. Will they succeed?

name: Bittu Ki Counselling
description: After Bittu runs away, Sodhi takes Goli's help to track and find him. Everyone sits with Bittu and tries to counsel him. Will he understand what the grown-ups have to say?

name: Kya Bittu Ko Ayegi Samajh?
description: The colony members are worried about Bittu running away due to his hatred towards studying. Will Bittu be found and will he finally realise the importance of education?

name: Bittu Ko Aayi Samajh
description: Bittu finally realises his mistakes and agrees to concentrate on his studies. Meanwhile, his parents come and are shocked to see the difference in their son.

name: Popatlal Ke Gehne
description: The society members struggle to keep up with the rising cost of living in the city. Popatlal receives a call from the bank asking him to clear his locker and take his belongings before the branch shuts down.

name: Locker Ki Talaash
description: Popatlal lives a paranoid life because of not having a locker for his jewellery. Can the Gokuldham residents find him a locker?

name: Popatlal's Paranoia
description: Popatlal spends sleepless nights in his house thinking about his jewellery's safety. He finally comes to the conclusion that he must keep the box in one of his neighbour's houses.

name: Sirf Ek Zimmedar Aadmi
description: Popatlal decides to keep the jewellery box at Bhide's house. However, Bhide later finds out that Popatlal is going out of town. Will Bhide be able to keep the jewellery safe?

name: Popatlal Ki Amanat
description: Bhide gets paranoid after getting Popatlal's jewellery and desperately looks for someone else to pass on the responsibility. Who will he find?

name: Popatlal Ke Zewar Hue Idhar Se Udhar
description: Jethalal tries to pass on the responsibility of the jewellery by giving the box to Babita. Will Popatlal's jewellery get mishandled?

name: Gehno Ki Zimmedari Kaun Le?
description: Babita passes on the responsibility of the jewellery to Anjali, as she and Iyer have to go somewhere. Will Anjali keep the box or will the exchange of hands continue?

name: Kya Sodhi Sambhaal Payega Zewar?
description: Popatlal's jewellery ends up at Sodhi's house. However, due to an emergency, Sodhi has to rush to his garage. Will the box be safe at Sodhi's house?

name: Popatlal Asks For His Amanat
description: Popatlal returns after finishing his work and thanks Bhide for keeping his jewellery safely. How will he react when he finds out the truth?

name: Getting The Box Back
description: Everyone tries to get Popatlal's box back from the person they gave it to. Jethalal begins to get a bad feeling about the jewellery box. Will his fears come true?

name: Popatlal Ka Dabba Gayab
description: Sodhi and his wife realise that they have messed up and given away the box of jewellery to Abdul without informing him what's in it. Can the Sodhis recover the box?

name: Society Mein Tension
description: All the residents of Gokuldham society panic as they start blaming each other for the missing Jewellery box. Can they manage to find the box and return it to Popatlal?

name: Popatlal Ka Darr
description: Bhide panics at the thought of Popatlal finding out that he has lost his jewellery box, but the society members reassure him that they all will take responsibility for the mistake. Will they find the jewellery or face Popatlal's wrath?

name: Phas Gaya Bhide
description: Bhide and Jethalal make excuses in front of Popatlal to delay giving the box. Will Popatlal fall for their lies?

name: Popatlal Ka Sona
description: The society members are shocked to see Popatlal with Sodhi's party sharty bag with the jewellery in it. How did Popatlal get his hands on it?

name: Dabba Khali Hai
description: After everyone finds the empty jewellery box, they call Bhide to ensure it contains jewellery. How will the members of Gokuldham find the jewellery?

name: Tapu Sena Distracts Popatlal
description: Jethalal and Sodhi take Tapu Sena's help to distract Popatlal. The members of Gokuldham meet Inspector Pandey and tell him about the theft.

name: Gehno Ke Saath Kho Kho
description: The members of Gokuldham Society give Inspector Pandey a list of suspects in the robbery. The police are quick to respond and round up the suspects. Will they find Popatlal's jewellery?

name: Sabke Ghar Ki Talashi
description: Inspector Pandey's investigation reveals that the suspects are not guilty of the theft. He insists on checking every household of the Gokuldham members. What will he find?

name: Jethalal Pakkda Gaya
description: Jethalal gets arrested when Popatlal's jewellery is found at his house. Everyone apologises to Inspector Pandey and requests him to let Jethalal go.

name: Locker Ka Intezaam
description: Tapu Sena is surprised to hear about the gold being recovered at Jethalal's home. Meanwhile, Jethalal arranges a locker for Popatlal.

name: Bhide Ke Liye Cheque
description: Bhide receives a piece of good news early in the morning. He decides to surprise his family and take Sodhi's help.

name: Goli Spoils Bhide's Surprise
description: Goli tells Tapu Sena about Bhide's plan to buy a car. When Sonu does not believe the news, they plan to put on a disguise to follow Sodhi and Bhide to find out the truth.

name: Bhide Ki Choices
description: Sodhi takes Bhide to a used car shop to look at all the cars that fall into his budget. Goli and Pinku follow them around to find the truth. Which car will Bhide choose?

name: Surprise Bani News
description: Sonu does not believe Goli when he tells her that Bhide has bought a car. Goli also lets Popatlal know about Bhide's surprise. How will Popatlal react?

name: Surprise Hua Fail
description: Everyone gathers at Popatlal's house to discuss Bhide's surprise. Jethalal returns home and lets Bapuji in on the news.

name: Har Ghar Tiranga
description: Bhide can't wait to surprise his family with the new car, but how will his family react to this? Meanwhile, Tapu Sena plans on putting the 'Tiranga' in every house.

name: Gadi Ka Welcome
description: The members of Gokuldham Society make preparations to welcome Bhide's new car. Bhide and Sodhi get shocked when they see the car enter the society. What could have gone wrong?

name: Bhide Reveals His Surprise
description: Bhide shocks everyone by telling them that he was only helping a friend buy a car. Soon, Bhide reveals his real surprise for his wife and daughter. Later, the members of Gokuldham gather to celebrate 75 years of independence.

name: Roshan Out Of Town
description: Roshan goes out of town to meet her family but warns Sodhi not to do 'party-sharty' at home. Will Sodhi go behind her back and break the rules?

name: Celebrating Nowruz
description: The Gokuldham society members get together and celebrate Nowruz with Roshan. Meanwhile, Sodhi and his friends contemplate their 'party-sharty' plan.

name: Sodhi Ki Party
description: Sodhi plans a party with his friends in Roshan's absence. Will he get caught?

name: Nowruz Ki Khushiya
description: Roshan finally gets to know about Sodhi's elaborate plan and how everyone was involved in it. Later, the entire colony prays for each other's well-being.

name: Gokuldham Ki Janmashtami
description: The members of Gokuldham society make preparations to celebrate Janmashtami. Will everything go smooth?

name: Dahi Handi Time
description: The members of the Gokuldham colony are excited to start the 'Dahi handi' proceedings. Will everything go smooth?

name: Govinda Aala
description: Things get competitive in the Gokuldham colony as all the participants try to break the Handi. Who will win the competition?

name: Goli Ka Prank
description: Bapuji is starving and asks Jethalal to order food for him, but Jethalal informs him that Komal would be sending them breakfast. However, when the breakfast arrives, Jethalal gets shocked to see the contents.

name: Khush Khabri For Jethalal
description: Jethalal gets frustrated with Bagha and Nattu Kaka when they delay giving him some good news. What's waiting in line for Jethalal?

name: Jethalal's USA Trip
description: Jethalal is excited about the opportunity of going to the United States of America. Will he be able to leave on such short notice?

name: America Jane Ki Khush Khabri
description: Jethalal shares his happiness with all the colony members. Meanwhile, Bhide is still upset about Popatlal's taunts

name: America Ki Taiyyari
description: Jethalal prepares for his journey to the United States of America. Will Jethalal's trip be successful?

name: America Ki Packing
description: The members of Gokuldham colony visit Jethalal with various requests, before he leaves for America. How will Jethalal react to this?

name: Jethalal Chala America
description: All the neighbours come to see off Jethalal before his departure for America. However, they are worried if Bapuji will be okay while living alone.

name: Bapuji Ka Khayal
description: The society members call for a meeting to work out a plan on how to take care of Bapuji during Jethalal's absence.

name: Ghar Pe Akele Bapuji
description: As Jethalal leaves for the United States, Bapuji becomes lonely at home. Will he be okay during his time alone?

name: First Night Alone
description: All the neighbours come to support Bapuji as she spends his first night alone.

name: Bapuji Ka Plan Chowpat
description: Bapuji makes a plan to meet his childhood friend for breakfast, but knowing how the Gokuldham colony is, will he make it on time?

name: Gokuldham's First Priority - Bapuji
description: Everyone in the colony goes out of their way to take care of Bapuji. Will everything go smooth?

name: Bapuji Kidhar Hai?
description: Bapuji doesn't open his door or answer his phone and sends the entire colony into panic mode. Is Bapuji alright?

name: Bapuji Hue Gussa
description: Bapuji gets fed up with his neighbours being over-enthusiastic about taking care of him. Will they be understanding and take a step back?

name: Welcoming Bappa
description: The Gokuldham Colony members are excited about welcoming Bappa. Will everything go according to plan?

name: Gokuldham Colony Mein Aaye Bappa
description: Gokuldham colony welcomes Bappa with an open heart. How will they celebrate this auspicious occasion?

name: Bappa Ke Aane Ki Khushiyan
description: The members of the Gokuldham colony celebrate Bappa's arrival but Anjali expresses her concerns about Taarak not being with her on this auspicious occasion.

name: Taarak's Gift
description: Anjali is upset about Taarak not being around during Ganpati but will his gift make up for it?

name: Taarak Returns
description: The entire colony is surprised to see Taarak return for the Ganpati celebrations. Meanwhile, Sodhi, Popatlal and Hathi want to know Bhide's questions in advance.

name: Rangarang Karyakram Ka Excitement
description: The entire colony prepares for the Rangarang Karyakram. Will everything go smooth during the function?

name: Rangarang Karyakram Ke Special Guest
description: Gokuldham residents begin the Rangarang Karyakram and invite a special guest to host the entire program. Who will the special guest be?

name: Bharat Ke Prasiddh Mandir
description: Sugandha plays a fun quiz with the Gokuldham residents about the famous temples of India. Who will score the most points and win the game?

name: The Country Of Miracles
description: The Rangarang Karyakram continues as Sugandha quizzes Babita, Madhavi and Bhide about the famous heritage sites in India. Will they be able to answer all the questions correctly?
