name: Hindustan Ki Pehchaan
description: Sodhi, Popatlal, and Anjali are next in line to participate in Sugandha's quiz. Will they be able to answer all the questions correctly?

name: Bharatiya Sanskriti Ki Khaasiyat
description: Tapu Sena, Iyer, and Taarak take on the challenge of answering all the quiz questions correctly. Will they be successful?

name: Rangarang Karyakram Ki Charam Seema
description: Abdul delivers a surprise performance for the Rangarang Karyakram. Meanwhile, Nattu Kaka and Bagha are next in line for the quiz.

name: Shradh Ki Zimmedari
description: Anjali catches Taarak eating samosas with Tapu Sena. Meanwhile, Taarak gets the responsibility of holding Shradh for his late father. Will Taarak be able to perform this important ritual properly?

name: Shradh Ki Taiyaari
description: Taarak and the society members prepare for his father's Shradh. Will everything go smooth?

name: Kauwe Ki Khoj
description: Taarak is worried as he can't find crows to eat his offerings. Gogi, Pinku, and the others offer their help to make the Shradh successful. Will things go in Taarak's favour this time?

name: Shradh Specialist
description: Taarak finally finds a few crows to eat the Shradh food, but Sodhi unknowingly scares them away. When Taarak is about to lose all hope, Abdul comes up with a unique solution. Will Abdul's idea work?

name: Maha Daan
description: Taarak and the others make their way to a park to look for crows. However, things take a turn for the worse when a thief steals Taarak's phone. What will he do now?

name: Jethalal Kab Aayega?
description: Jethalal's family and friends are eagerly waiting for him to return from his USA trip. However, no one has spoken to him in the past two days. Will Jethalal return home safely?

name: Jethalal Returns
description: Jethalal returns to India without informing about his arrival to any of the society members. Will he return home safely?

name: Jethalal Ka Bura Naseeb
description: After returning from the USA, three thieves rob Jethalal and steal all of his belongings. What will he do now?

name: Jethalal Behind Bars
description: Jethalal tries to file a complaint at the police station about the robbery. But Chalu Pandey refuses to take his complaint and locks him up instead. What will happen now?

name: Jethalal Ki Ghar Wapsi
description: Chalu Pandey lets Jethalal, and the others go after listening to their explanation. Jethalal reaches Gokuldham and decides to surprise Bapuji.

name: Gifts From Jethalal
description: Jethalal brings a special shirt for Bapuji from his US trip. However, Jethalal is unaware that someone has mistakenly replaced the shirt with a frock. What will happen now?

name: Dosti Ki Bhasha
description: Jethalal calls Taarak at his office, which puts Taarak's job at risk. How will he handle this situation?

name: Excitement For Navratri
description: Gokuldham residents are eagerly waiting for the Navratri celebrations to begin. Meanwhile, Jethalal finds it difficult to fit into his old Garba dress.

name: Society Ki Permission
description: Jethalal wants to perform the first aarti of Navratri to pray for Daya's return. However, Bhide says that he has to take permission from all society members first. Will the society members accept his request?

name: Jethalal's Meeting
description: Jethalal gets the opportunity to perform the first aarti of Navratri. However, he gets called to Lonavala for an important meeting. What will happen now?

name: Jethalal Matlab Musibat
description: Everyone begins to worry, as Jethalal is getting late for the aarti. Will Jethalal be able to get back in time?

name: Nav Durga Ke Darshan
description: Jethalal manages to reach on time and performs the first aarti of Navratri. Later, all the Gokuldham residents play Garba together.

name: The Last Film Show In Gokuldham
description: Asit Modi brings the star of Chhello Show, Bhavin Rabari and the director, Pan Nalin, to meet all of their favourite Gokuldham residents.

name: Bachat Mantra
description: Bhide shares his mantra for savings with Tapu Sena. Meanwhile, Nattu Kaka and Bagha remind Jethalal about submitting his maintenance cheque.

name: Maintenance Ka Cheque
description: Bhide celebrates when Jethalal brings the maintenance cheque on time. However, a silly mistake by Jethalal quickly spoils the celebration.

name: Gokuldham Ki Shaan
description: Bhide finds out that Tapu is about to return to Gokuldham. Meanwhile, Jethalal scolds Nattu Kaka about spoiling his maintenance cheque.

name: Doctor Hathi Ki Dawa
description: Jethalal brings Bapuji to Dr Hathi's clinic to treat his stomach ache. Meanwhile, Gokuldham society members are worried about the moss build-up in the society compound.

name: Gokuldham Mein Bhookamp
description: Dr Hathi slips and falls in the society compound because of the moss build-up. Will the society members be able to lift him up?

name: Sodhi Ka Idea
description: Sodhi comes up with a unique solution to lift Dr Hathi up from the ground. Will his plan work?

name: Contractor Kaha Milega?
description: The members of Gokuldham society decide to repaint the colony but Bhide struggles to find a contractor who is ready to do the job before Diwali. Can a solution be found?

name: Contractor Ki Khoj
description: The members of Gokuldham society interview multiple contractors and ask for their budget for repainting their colony. Will a suitable contractor be found on time?

name: Patakho Ki Testing
description: Tapu Sena helps Abdul test the new firecrackers at his shop. Meanwhile, the committee members gather at the clubhouse to finalize a contractor.

name: Contractors Ki Meeting
description: Society members sit down for a meeting to select the best contractor out of the top four. Will they be able to make a sound decision?

name: Contractors Ki Ladai
description: After interviewing all the contractors, the society members decide to shortlist one. Who will be the one to get the job?

name: Painting Ka Kaam Shuru
description: Gokuldham residents decide to give the contract for painting the society to Raju Chamke. Will things go according to plan?

name: Bhide Ka Sabse Bada Darr
description: The painting job in Gokuldham begins in full zest. However, Bhide is anxious about things going wrong. Will all of his worries come true?

name: Diwali Ki Excitement
description: Gokuldham residents are excited to celebrate Diwali in the newly painted society. But will the contractor be able to complete the work on time?

name: Bad News For Bhide
description: The contractor gives Bhide the bad news and tells him that the painting job won't get finished on time. What will Bhide do now?

name: Saving Diwali
description: Bhide is ready to face everyone's anger when the painting job gets delayed. However, he gets a surprise once he steps out of his house.

name: Gokuldham Ki Diwali
description: After the painting job gets completed, all Gokuldham residents celebrate Diwali together. The next day, Huma Qureshi and Sonakshi Sinha arrive at Gokuldham to meet Dr Hathi.

name: Bapuji Ki Treat
description: Bapuji treats Tapu Sena with pizzas to reward them for saving the Diwali celebrations. Meanwhile, Bhide decides to penalize Jethalal if he doesn't pay the maintenance cheque on time.

name: Jethalal Ki Penalty
description: Jethalal lies to Bapuji about giving the maintenance cheque. However, Bhide arrives at Jethalal's house and his lie comes out in front of everyone.

name: Jethalal Ke Cheques
description: Bagha and Nattu Kaka request Jethalal to sign some cheques. Later, Babita shows up at Jethalal's shop with some of her friends.

name: Jethalal Ka Sabak
description: Jethalal apologises to Bhide for not submitting the maintenance cheque on time. However, Bhide is adamant that if Jethalal doesn't pay the penalty, he will resign from the secretary post.

name: Jethalal Ki Tarkeeb
description: Bhide agrees to accompany Jethalal and Taarak to the medical store. But he is unaware that it was all a trick to give him the maintenance cheque. What will Bhide do when he finds out the truth?

name: Cheque Ka Hungama
description: Madhavi tells Bhide that she accidentally washed the kurta that the cheque was in. What will happen when Jethalal finds out about this?

name: Guru Nanak Jayanti Ki Badhaiya
description: Sodhi and his family celebrate Guru Nanak Jayanti with all Gokuldham residents. Meanwhile, Goli is scared as he spills chutney on Sakharam. What will Bhide do when he finds out?

name: Guru Nanak Ji Ki Anmol Seekh
description: Sodhi and his family continue to celebrate Guru Nanak Jayanti and spread happiness among Gokuldham residents.

name: Tapu Sena's Dinner Plan
description: Tapu Sena decides to take Bapuji out for dinner. Will their dinner plan be successful?

name: Dinner With Bapuji
description: Bapuji wants to go out for dinner with Tapu Sena, but Jethalal is worried about this plan. How will things pan out?

name: Restaurant Pahuchne Mein Deri
description: Problems keep piling up one after another, which causes a delay in the dinner plans. Can Tapu Sena and the others reach the restaurant in time?

name: International Client
description: Jethalal scolds Bagha when a customer complains about him. Later, an important client from abroad contacts Jethalal about a big contract.

name: Taarak's Important Task
description: Jethalal decides to bring Taarak along with him for the meeting with the international client. However, Taarak refuses as he gets assigned an important task by his boss. What will Jethalal do now?

name: Office Se Chutti
description: Taarak decides to make an excuse to dodge office work and attend the meeting with Jethalal. Will this plan work?

name: Taarak's Lie
description: Taarak decides to lie to his boss and help Jethalal instead of going to the office. Will Jethalal get into trouble because of this?

name: International Client's Arrival
description: Taarak arrives at Jethalal's shop, and all of them await the international client's arrival. Will the business deal go as planned?

name: Taarak In A Mess
description: Things get complicated for Taarak as his boss reaches Gada Electronics. Will his boss find out that Taarak lied to him about his injury?

name: A Surprise For Taarak
description: Taarak finds out that his boss is headed to his home to surprise him. Taarak rushes back before his boss finds out that he lied about his injury.

name: Bhide And Abdul's Plan
description: Bhide and Abdul try to think of excuses to stop Taarak's boss from entering the society. Meanwhile, Taarak and Jethalal encounter a lot of problems while on their way home.

name: Doctor Hathi To The Rescue
description: Doctor Hathi stalls Taarak's boss and takes him to his home. Meanwhile, Taarak encounters even more problems while on his way to Gokuldham. Will Taarak's boss find out about his lie?

name: Tapu Sena's Distraction Plan
description: Tapu Sena coaxes Taarak's boss to play cricket with them. Will they be able to buy Taarak enough time to return home?

name: Efforts Gone In Vain?
description: Despite all the efforts from Gokuldham residents, Taarak's boss finally finds his way inside Taarak's house. What will happen when he finds out the truth?

name: Sakharam Goes Missing
description: Taarak tells everyone how he safely made it back home. Later, Bhide gets a shock as Sakharam goes missing from the society compound.

name: Bhide's Search For Sakharam
description: Bhide takes Taarak's help to look for Sakharam. Bhide thinks that Jethalal has played a prank on him by taking Sakharam away. Will his hunch prove to be true?

name: Late For Work
description: Jethalal's tension begins in the morning as Nattu Kaka and Bagha get late for work. However, the tension seemingly goes away as Jethalal receives an order for two hundred TVs.

name: Gambhir Mudda
description: Jethalal has to go to Daman for an important meeting, and he gives Bhide the responsibility of taking care of Bapuji. Meanwhile, Popatlal gets a call from the marriage bureau about a potential match.

name: Disheartened Popatlal
description: Popatlal gets disheartened when things don't work out for him at the marriage bureau. Later, he eavesdrops on Bhide talking to someone about looking for a potential groom. Will Popatlal finally get a match?

name: The Suitable Groom
description: Popatlal overhears Bhide's conversation and finds out that his uncle is looking for a suitable groom for his daughter. Will this be the opportunity to get married Popatlal was waiting for?

name: Finding Vidya's Address
description: Popatlal takes help from Gogi and Goli to find Vidya's address and meet her in person. Will Popatlal's plan work?

name: Shiv Ganga Village
description: Popatlal, Gogi and Goli travel to Shiv Ganga village to meet Vidya and propose to her for marriage. Meanwhile, Bhide decides to apologise to Popatlal for his behaviour.

name: Popatlal And Vidya
description: Popatlal decides to meet Vidya at the school where she works as a teacher. Meanwhile, Gogi and Goli's parents begin to grow suspicious about their activities.

name: Angry Sudhakar
description: Sudhakar is fuming with anger and decides to confront Bhide about Popatlal's actions. What will happen when Popatlal returns to Gokuldham?

name: Bhide's Wrath
description: Bhide is furious with Popatlal for his actions and chases him all around the colony. What will happen when Bhide finally gets his hands on him?

name: Popatlal Hides
description: Popatlal sneaks into Iyer and Babita's house to escape Bhide's wrath. But how long will it be before Bhide catches him?

name: Search For Popatlal
description: Popatlal hides inside Taarak's house when Iyer refuses to help him. Meanwhile, Bhide looks everywhere around the society in search of Popatlal. What will happen when Popatlal finally catches up to him?

name: Popatlal's Escape
description: Taarak tries to lure Bhide away so that Popatlal can escape from the society. Will Popatlal find a safe place to hide?

name: Bhide Suspects Everyone
description: Bhide starts doubting everyone and thinks that they are helping Popatlal hide. Will someone slip up and reveal the truth?

name: Bhide Confronts
description: Bhide is unable to find Popatlal and his friends tell him to leave the matter for now and confront him when he returns. What will happen next?

name: Sudhakar Mama Warns Gokuldham Society
description: Sudhakar Mama arrives in Gokuldham society along with other people from his village to confront Bhide and Popatlal. Will Popatlal finally show his face?

name: Bhide's Decision
description: Chalu Pandey agrees to find Popatlal on the condition that Bhide will not take the case back under any circumstance. What will Bhide do now?

name: Police Complaint Against Popatlal
description: Gokuldham residents are shocked when they learn that Bhide has filed a police complaint against Popatlal. However, Popatlal is still nowhere to be found. What will happen now?

name: Finding Popatlal
description: Chalu Pandey reassures Bhide that they will find Popatlal in time. He thinks that Popatlal is hiding within the society compound and assigns a special agent to sniff him out.

name: Truth Revealed
description: Everyone who helped Popatlal gets forced to reveal the truth in front of Bhide. Will Popatlal finally show his face?

name: Will Popatlal be Caught?
description: Chalu Pandey and his canine look for Popatlal all over the colony. Can 009 find Popatlal's distinct smell and trace him?

name: Inspector Pandey's Celebration
description: Inspector Pandey catches Popatlal and asks the rest of the members to back off. Will his celebration of catching the first criminal in Gokuldham Society last long?

name: Sudhakar Mama Wants Popatlal
description: Sudhakar Mama arrives at Gokuldham along with a group of people from his village. Will Bhide and the others hand over Popatlal to them?

name: The Eye Opener
description: The tables seem to have turned as Sudhakar and Vidya thank Popatlal for opening their eyes. Will Popatlal's wish of getting married finally be fulfilled?

name: Unlucky Popatlal
description: Popatlal proves to be unlucky once again, as he finds out that Vidya loves someone else. Meanwhile, Chalu Pandey is adamant about arresting Bhide, as per their deal.

name: Sonu Ke Special Guests
description: Sonu prepares breakfast for the special guests that are coming to her house. Bhide and Madhavi are puzzled by the change in her behaviour. Who will the special guests be?

name: Year End Sale At Gada Electronics
description: Bhide tells Jethalal and Bapuji about the events that transpired between Popatlal and Sudhakar Mama. Meanwhile, Bagha and Nattu Kaka come up with an innovative offer for increasing sales before the New Year.

name: New Year Ki Party Ka Rang
description: Tapu Sena takes Bhide's help to plan a party for New Year's Eve. They decide to let everyone draw chits with a random colour that they would have to wear at the party.

name: Gokuldham Welcomes The New Year
description: Gokuldham residents come together to celebrate the New Year together. However, Taarak is worried that something might go wrong. Will Taarak's fears come true?

name: Naye Saal Ka Naya Suvichar
description: Bhide kicks off the new year by writing the thought of the day in Sanskrit. However, many Gokuldham residents are puzzled by the meaning behind the thought. Who will be able to decipher its true meaning?

name: Bharat Ki Pracheen Bhasha
description: Jethalal tries to decipher the meaning behind the thought written in Sanskrit. Meanwhile, Bagha brings good news for Jethalal in the morning.

name: Naye Saal Ki Khushkhabri
description: Jethalal finds out that the profits of Gada Electronics have increased by fifty per cent over the past year. Meanwhile, Bagha rushes to meet Bawri, who has just returned from Kanpur.

name: Bagha Ka Toota Dil
description: Bagha gets worried as Bawri gets late for their date. He goes to Bawri's house to check on her but finds that her house is locked.

name: Bagha Ki Tragic Love Story
description: Bagha gets depressed when Bawri refuses to talk to him. Will Nattu Kaka and Jethalal be able to cheer up his mood?

name: Badey Order Ki Tension
description: Jethalal is anxious as he receives a large order, but Bagha is in no condition to work. Meanwhile, Jethalal seeks Taarak's help to find a solution to this problem.

name: Bagha Bhaag Gaya
description: Bagha runs away from home and is not picking up his phone. Meanwhile, Jethalal gets tensed about completing the order on time.

name: Bagha Ho Gaya Seedha
description: Jethalal and the others find Bagha inside a bar, drinking away his sorrow. What will happen when Bagha drinks too much?

name: Party Sharty Ka Nateeja
description: Bagha creates a ruckus in the society, and no one is able to handle him. What will Gokuldham residents do now?

name: Bagha Ki Zidd
description: Taarak and Anjali come up with a plan to get Bagha to step down from the balcony. Will their plan work?

name: Nashe Mein Bagha

description: Bapuji explains how he managed to hide from Taarak's boss. Later, Taarak unboxes the gift his boss gave him.

Meanwhile, Babita registers for driving lessons and Jethalal tries to speed up the process of Babita receiving the car earlier than customary.

name: Bagha Ka Idea
description: Taarak is worried because he doesnâ€™t know how to take leave from his office and decides to ask Jethalal for advice. Taarak shares his problem with Bagha. Will Bagha be able to help Taarak with his problem?

name: Jethalal Ke Priya Mitra

name: Wakeel Ka Number
