description: All the men of Gokuldham society help Sodhi clean up after he parties with his friends. Soon, Abdul calls to tell them that Roshan has just entered the society. Will Sodhi get caught?

name: Roshan Returns To Gokuldham
description: While Roshan enters her house, Sodhi and his friends hide on the balcony and make their way to Bhide's balcony. How long will Sodhi hide from Roshan?

name: Planning Sodhi's Escape
description: The male members of the society come up with an elaborate plan to hide Sodhi at Popatlal's house. Will Sodhi succeed in lying to Roshan?

name: Kya Sodhi Ka Jooth Pakda Jayega?
description: While Sodhi lies to Roshan over the phone about being on his way back, his friends who left earlier return to party with him. Meanwhile, Roshan finds the keys to Sodhi's car.

name: Bhide Ki Chinta
description: All the men are worried about Sodhi's truth coming out in front of everyone. Meanwhile, Roshan arrives at Bhide's house to ask about Sodhi. Will she find out the truth?

name: Sodhi Ka Jhooth Pakda Gaya
description: Bhide tries to assure Roshan that Sodhi is not at fault, while Sodhi lies to her. Later, Roshan visits Popatlalâ€™s house to catch Sodhi red-handed. What will happen now?

name: Sodhi Kaha Hai?
description: Roshan visits Iyer's house, inquiring about Sodhi's whereabouts. Later, she checks Taarak's house but can't find him there either. Where could Sodhi be?

name: Jethalal Bhi Hai Gayab
description: Gokuldham men apologize to Champaklal for their deception regarding Sodhi. Meanwhile, Jethalal is discovered missing from his bedroom, leading everyone to speculate that he and Sodhi might be hiding together.

name: Roshan Ghar Chor Kar Mat Jao
description: Jethalal declares his ignorance about Sodhi's whereabouts to everyone. Despite exhaustive efforts, Sodhi remains untraceable, leading to Roshan's decision to depart from Gokuldham society and stay with her parents.

name: Sodhi Aur Roshan Ki Sulha
description: Sodhi offers a sincere apology to Roshan, mending their differences. Afterwards, the men of Gokuldham question Bhide about his actions, wondering why he went behind their backs.

name: Anniversary Ki Mithas
description: Sodhi and Roshan distribute Kada Prasad among all their friends and invite them to their anniversary party. Will things go smoothly for them this time?

name: Sodhi Aur Roshan Ki Party
description: Everyone celebrates at a party held in honour of Roshan and Sodhi, making a grand entrance. Later, Champaklal decides to go on a trip with his friends.

name: Tapu Sena Ka Idea
description: Tapu tells Tapu Sena what they should organize for the society's party and requests Bhide to invite everyone to the clubhouse, but Bhide refuses. What unfolds next in this situation?

name: Meeting Ka Reason
description: Gokuldham members gather in the playhouse for a meeting, yet they remain curious about its purpose. Later, Tapu unveils his plan. What exactly is Tapu's strategy?

name: Fine Dena Hoga
description: A debate ensues over the ideal fine for an unpopular gift, prompting everyone to brainstorm diverse and thoughtful gift ideas later on. Whose gift will be the worst?

name: Chit Uthao
description: Tapu Sena visits each house, inviting everyone to draw a chit from a bowl, determining the recipient of their gift.

name: Secret Gift Ka Confusion
description: Gokuldham residents contemplate their gift ideas for the Secret Santa. Will they be able to make the right decision before the party?

name: Santa Collects Gifts
description: Nattu Kaka and Bagha dress up as Santa and go to everyoneâ€™s house in Gokuldham society and collect their gifts. Later, everyone gathers for the party.

name: Gift Uthao
description: Bawri suggests a creative way for everyone to express their feelings about the gifts. The person with the least-liked gift will be subject to a fine.

name: Acche Aur Bure Gifts
description: Gokuldham members continue picking up gifts. Are they liking their gifts or not?

name: Kisne Diya Gift?
description: Anjali isn't fond of her gift, but Taarak encourages her to accept it graciously. Meanwhile, Bhide is delighted to discover that Madhavi is the one behind the thoughtful gift for Sonu. Who will pay the fine now?

name: Pichle Saal Ke Events
description: Anjali and Taarak are happy with Tapu Senaâ€™s idea and discuss all the events from last year. Later, Babita wishes Jethalal a happy new year.

name: Naye Saal Ka Josh
description: Bhide asks Jethalal to give the maintenance cheque on time. Meanwhile, Champaklal returns to Gokuldham society and meets Tapu Sena.

name: Jagah Kam Aur Saman Zyada
description: Bagha crafts a sales-boosting poem for Gada Electronics. Simultaneously, Bawri pitches a new scheme to Jethalal, Bagha, and Nattu Kaka. Bhide urges Madhavi to organize their home, leading her to decide to declutter by discarding unnecessary items.

name: Purana Saman Pheko
description: Bhide insists on keeping his old belongings, explaining their sentimental value to Madhavi. Will Madhavi let him keep his old things?

name: Madhavi Ko Pata Chala Sach
description: Abdul tells Bhide about garbage being dumped in the society office, in front of Madhavi. Later, Madhavi discovers the truth, realizing both Bhide and Sodhi deceived her.

name: Goli's Wise Advice
description: Popatlal and Madhavi covertly sell Bhide's old items, intending to keep it a secret from him. Bhide confides in Goli about the situation, and Goli offers him wise counsel.

name: Popatlal Maan Gaya
description: Bhide seeks Taarak's assistance to persuade Popatlal about the importance of his old belongings. Popatlal tries to buy Bhide's box, but the shopkeeper refuses to sell it. Later, Madhavi shares her diary with her friends.

name: Bhide Ki Anmol Yaadein
description: Madhavi loses her old walkman, which makes her understand the attachment Bhide had to his old belongings. Madhavi and Sonu decide to go to the shop and bring Bhide's belongings back.

name: Bhide Gets His Things Back
description: Bhide pretends to be upset about his old things, but Madhavi returns them, realizing their sentimental value. Meanwhile, Sukhi tells Sodhi that his car is lucky.

name: Sodhi Ki Gadi Ruk Gayi
description: Bhide is urged to throw a party as Sonu triumphs over Tapu in badminton. Sodhi celebrates with soda, sharing stories about his lucky car. However, Sodhi's joy is short-lived as his friend informs him that the car has broken down. Now, what will Sodhi do?

name: Sher Kharab Ho Gaya
description: Gokuldham men search for Sodhi's friend, Sukhi. They push the car and Sodhi tries to start it but it doesn't work. Later, Gokuldham ladies worry for them.

name: Sher Ko Kara Repair
description: Sodhi plans to repair his car. Jethalal suggests getting a new car, but Sodhi chooses to repair the existing one. Later, Sodhi gets ready to drop Roshan at her relative's place and Tapu Sena at the mall. Will his car work fine now?

name: Tapu Sena Helps Popatlal
description: Lost in the mall, Popatlal searches for Tapu Sena. He encounters an unmarried girl, and Tapu Sena seizes the opportunity to help Popatlal make a good impression on her.

name: Popatlal Ki Date
description: Popatlal and Anokhi decide to go on a long drive together. Tapu Sena congratulates Popatlal, and they celebrate at the mall. Later, Sodhi offers to lend Popatlal his car for the long drive. Will everything go according to Popatlal's plan?

name: Jethalal Has Jalebi And Fafda
description: Popatlal prays for his relationship at the temple, while Jethalal, craving jalebi and fafda, considers inviting Taarak and Babita. Jethalal invites Taarak for breakfast, and Taarak waits for Anjali to leave to visit Jethalal's house discreetly.

name: Popatlal's Date With Anokhi
description: Popatlal prepares to meet Anokhi, and Sodhi enhances his car for a romantic evening for Popatlal and Anokhi. Champaklal informs Jethalal about attending a bhajan kirtan with Tapu Sena. Later, Popatlal takes Anokhi on a drive.

name: Gaddi Band Ho Gayi
description: "Popatlal's meeting with Anokhi triggers memories for Anjali and Taarak. Anokhi suggests they get to know each other better before making commitments. Later, Popatlal's car stops, and he asks Anokhi for help pushing it."

name: Gaddi Kaha Hai?
description: Popatlal angrily confronts Sodhi, blaming his car for ruining his date. He insults Sodhi and reveals he left the car in the jungle, angering Sodhi, but Popatlal refuses to disclose the exact location. What will Sodhi do now?

name: Wrong Match For Popatlal
description: Popatlal wants his umbrella back, but Sodhi insists on knowing his car's location first. Popatlal tearfully shares the story of Anokhi leaving him due to Sodhi's car but refuses to disclose its whereabouts. Taarak suggests Anokhi may not have been the right match for him.

name: Sher Ki Missing Complaint
description: Gokuldham men discover Sodhi's car missing, report it at the police station, and unintentionally disrupt Chalu Pandey's outing plans.

name: Inspector Pandey Looks For Sodhi's Car
description: Inspector Pandey discloses Popatlal's involvement in the car theft, and Gokuldham residents vow not to interfere. Together, they join the inspector to search for Sodhi's car.

name: Inspector Pandey Is Angry
description: Inspector Pandey wants to solve the case on his own. Gokuldham women debate informing Roshan about Sodhi's stolen car. Later, as Pandey gets crucial information about the car which makes him suspect that Gokuldham residents are making a fool out of him.

name: Ek Aur Complaint
description: Inspector Pandey plans to arrest all Gokuldham men, bringing them to the society compound. Later, Inspector Pandey receives a call about two people filing a complaint about Sodhi's missing car, stirring confusion.

name: Sodhi's New Car
description: Roshan surprises Sodhi with a new car, confessing the old one was never stolen. Inspector Pandey complains about Gokuldham residents causing trouble again.

name: Sodhi Ke Naye Number
description: Taarak convinces Anjali to make a sweet treat. Tapu Sena asks Gogi for a treat as his father got a new car. Sodhi excitedly shares the news of his new car number in Gokuldham society.

name: Permanent Number Ka Celebration
description: Sodhi shares sweets with everyone in Gokuldham to celebrate getting the permanent number for his new car. Later, Sodhi and Tapu Sena decide to have a party together.

name: Sodhi Ki Nayi Gaadi
description: Sodhi celebrates his new car by taking all kids on a joy ride. However, he soon finds out that his car is not where he parked it. Where could it be?

name: 4000 Episodes Ki Khushi
description: Sodhi learns thereâ€™s an issue with his carâ€™s number plate while the community joyfully marks the milestone of 4000 episodes of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.

name: 4000 Episodes Ki Journey
description: The Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah family marks their 4000th episode with jubilant singing, dancing, and a festive cake cutting.

name: Bhide Ke Liye Surprise
description: Gokuldham residents savour kulfi in celebration of finding Sodhi's lost car. Madhavi has a surprise for Bhide. However, Bhide misconstrues Madhavi and Sonu's actions, believing they are scouting for potential suitors for Sonu's marriage.

name: Online Scams Se Bacho
description: Gokuldham men enjoy a soda session, but Popatlal feels left out. They discuss online shopping risks. Later, Bhide expresses interest in buying a gold chain for Sonu.

name: Madhavi's Surprise
description: Madhavi is worried that Bhide will find out about her surprise from the passbook. Meanwhile, Bhide runs into Popatlal on his way to the bank, and both of them get into an argument.

name: Madhavi Ko Scam Karne Ki Koshish
description: Bhide learns about Madhavi's 80,000 rupees and the truth about Sonu's gold chain. Scammers target Madhavi's account, and Mahesh offers to return Bhide's money, but he hesitates due to concerns about leaving Sonu and Madhavi alone.

name: Madhavi Ka Parcel
description: Madhavi and Anjali eagerly await Madhavi's parcel, but Madhavi is taken aback by the size of it. Despite having paid online, the delivery person requests payment upon arrival. Is this a potential scam?

name: Madhavi Takes Cyber Crime Unit's Help
description: Madhavi and Sonu discover the delivery boy's scam. The bank manager advises Madhavi to involve the police and seek the Cyber Crime Unit's help, while Tapu Sena steps in to assist Sonu.

name: Madhavi Lies To Bhide
description: Inspector Pandey asks Abdul to recall any distinctive details about the fraudulent delivery boy. Although Inspector Pandey gets busy with other crucial tasks which upsets Madhavi. Subsequently, Madhavi fabricates a story to Bhide, asserting that she purchased the chain as a gift for Sonu.

name: Fake Chain For Bhide
description: Madhavi doesnâ€™t want to tell Bhide about the scam and Tapu Sena buys a fake gold chain. Later, Bhide asks Tapu Sena why thereâ€™s no jewellerâ€™s name on the box.

name: Search For The Scammer
description: Sonu and Madhavi decide to hide the scam from Bhide for the next two days. Tapu Sena approaches Popatlal, and he agrees to help them find the delivery boy who scammed Madhavi.

name: Scammer Ko Pakadna Hoga
description: Tapu Sena and Popatlal plan to hide the gold chain truth from Bhide. Bhide claims he went to the temple for a new chain to spare Sonu's feelings. Later, they come up with a plan to catch the scammer.

name: CCTV Shop Kaun Jayega?
description: Bhide discovers the soda shop empty, and Tapu Sena updates the Gokuldham men about Madhavi's scam. Later, Jethalal and Iyer plan to act as police officers to gather evidence against the scammer at the CCTV shop.

name: Mahila Mandal Ko Chain Dekhni Hai
description: Bhide detects a secretive gathering unfolding without his knowledge, but Goli adeptly diffuses the situation with a clever explanation. The Mahila Mandal expresses interest in seeing Sonu's gold chain, leaving Madhavi anxious about potential doubts regarding its authenticity.

name: Jethalal Ho Raha Hai Late
description: Jethalal suspects Iyer's plan to leave town and advises Bhide to gift something special to Madhavi. With Champaklal sensing a secret, the group eagerly awaits Jethalal's departure for his shop.

name: Jethalal And Iyer Banne Police
description: Bawri comes to shop for a speaker at Gada Electronics. The Gokuldham men and Tapu Sena gather at Jethalal's shop, with Jethalal and Iyer donning police disguises. Later, everyone warns them to steer clear of CCTV cameras.

name: Nakli Police Ka Mission
description: Some customers at Gada Electronics mistake Jethalal and Iyer for real policemen. The shopkeeper agrees to show them the recording and both of them find out more information about the scammer.

name: Tattoo Wala Clue
description: The CCTV shop owner informs Inspector Panday about two individuals posing as police officers who had previously viewed the footage. Inspector Panday suspects their involvement in the scam. Jethalal and Iyer share the CCTV footage with everyone, revealing a small clue related to the scammer.

name: Tattoo Artist Ki Help Chahiye Hai
description: The tattoo artist informs Jethalal and Iyer that the scammer has his tattoo design. With the scammer's phone number and name in hand, the Gokuldham members devise a plan to catch him and decide to seek the tattoo artist's help.

name: Scammer Ko Diya Lalach
description: The tattoo artist lures the scammer, Babban, to his studio, claiming the tattoo design has won a prize. Inspector Panday learns about Jethalal and Iyer's fake police officer act at the CCTV shop. Now, everyone awaits the scammer's arrival at the tattoo studio.

name: Scammer Pakda Gaya
description: Babban is caught at the tattoo studio, and the Gokuldham members plan to take him to Madhav for identification. Meanwhile, Bhide is left in the dark, and Inspector Panday learns about the Gokuldham members' strategy.

name: Jethalal And Iyer In Danger
description: Inspector Panday is furious seeing Jethalal and Iyer in police uniforms, planning their arrest along with the scammer. Later, Madhavi apologizes to Bhide. Will he forgive her?

name: Popatlal Ka Janam Din
description: Gokuldham residents prepare to celebrate Popatlal's birthday together. Popatlal takes a leave from work to celebrate his birthday. Will things go according to his wishes?

name: Popatlal Akela Rahega
description: Popatlal daydreams of a birthday celebration filled with well-wishes for his swift marriage but he is determined not to be pitied so he resolves to steer clear of meeting anyone on his special day.

name: Akele Mein Birthday
description: Despite the Tapu Sena's sincere attempt to wish him, Popatlal plays elusive, turning off his phone and celebrating in solitary splendour. Later, Popatlal overhears everyone talking about his marriage.

name: Birthday Ke Din Gayab
description: Bhide wishes Popatlal on the society board but can't reach him. They ask Abdul about Popatlal's whereabouts. Meanwhile, Sodhi and Bhide plan a party, unknowingly overheard by Champaklal.

name: Important Sting Operation
description: Taarak contacts Popatlal's boss but discovers he is not there either. Gokuldham residents believe Popatlal is engaged in a vital sting operation. Later, Popatlal receives an urgent office assignment, now faced with the task of leaving discreetly for the mission.

name: Popatlal Ne Bhes Badla
description: Abdul gives Popatlal a disguise to go incognito outside Gokuldham. When he encounters Mahila Mandal, Abdul concocts a tale to conceal Popatlal's identity.

name: Surprise Party For Popatlal
description: Gokuldham residents and Popatlal's colleagues kidnap Popatlal and take him to his surprise party. Popatlal tells everyone why he didn't want to celebrate his birthday with them.

name: Popatlal Bachayega Paise
description: Abdul grapples with a customer's needs, and Popatlal voices his concern to Bhide about his management of the society. Later, Popatlal proposes a cost-saving idea to address the society's expenses.

name: Asli Ya Nakli Delivery Boy
description: Popatlal and Bhide trap the delivery boy in the society office. Seeking help, Bhide contacts Sodhi. Later, the delivery boy tells Popatal that his relative works at a marriage bureau.

name: Kiska Parcel Hai?
description: Anjali denies placing any online orders. The delivery boy joins Sodhi, Popatlal, and Bhide in a quest to find out who made the order. Whose parcel is it?

name: OTP Chahiye Hai
description: Popatlal advises everyone to open the package and see what's inside, but the delivery boy won't give it to anyone unless they give him the delivery OTP first.

name: Commissioner Se Panga
description: Bhide asks Inspector Pandayâ€™s boss to give him his OTP, but Pandayâ€™s boss thinks Bhide is trying to scam him. What will happen now?

name: Adhunik Duniya Ke Nuksaan
description: Gokuldham Society members find out that the parcel belongs to Jethalal. Bhide insists that Jethalal performs two hundred situps for his wrong judgment. What will Jethalal do now?

name: Taarak Ka Half-Day
description: Taarak chooses to write an article about Indian festivals while having a great half-holiday. Later, Tapu Sena questions Bhide about the arrangements for the Holi festival.

name: Holi Par Bach Kar Raho
description: Mahila Mandal discusses their memories of Holi, while Tapu Sena purchases colours for the festival. Later, Tapu Sena receives a warning from two girls that some boys are throwing colours at everyone. What will Tapu Sena do?

name: Tapu Sena Ne Sikhaya Sabak
description: Tapu Sena watches as a group of boys taunt and throw colour at a girl. They teach them a lesson. Later, Sonu requests that Tapu Sena keep this incident from Bhide.

name: Holi Celebration Ki Shuruat
description: Bagha and Nattu Kaka give Jethalal plans to expand Gada Electronics' customer base. Later, when everyone gathers at the Gokuldham Society to celebrate Holi, a group of boys plan to take revenge from Tapu Sena.

name: Gokuldham Wasiyo Ki Kavita
description: The Gokuldham residents recite poems during the Holi celebration, adding to the joy and laughter of the occasion.

name: Guddu Ka Plan
description: Guddu wants to take revenge against Tapu and plans on causing trouble at the Holi celebration at Gokuldham. What will he do?

name: Sonu In Danger
description: During the Holi celebrations at Gokuldham Society, Sonu is targeted by a group of boys who decide to put colour on her. Who will rescue her?

name: Bawri Ke Parents Aa Gaye
description: Jethalal asks Tapu to apologize to Champaklal. Popatlal argues with an auto driver. Later, Bagha and Bawri request Jethalal to meet Bawri's parents.

name: April Fool Banayenge
description: Champaklal and friends plan a gathering, while Jethalal and his friends scheme to play an April Fool's prank on the Gokuldham society members.

name: April Fool Ki Planning
description: Anjali tricks Taarak with green juice, while Taarak pulls a prank on Goli. Later, the Gokuldham men plan their April Fool's Day prank and party venue.

name: Sabke Alag Bahane
description: The men concoct fake excuses to leave and head to the clubhouse for an April Foolâ€™s prank, but Bhide finds himself unexpectedly stuck at home, unable to join them.

name: Clubhouse Mein Party Sharty
description: All the men try to sneak into the clubhouse, but the clubhouse is locked. Jethalal comes up with a plan to get Bhide out of his house. Will his plan work?

name: Popatlal Ne Kari Complain
description: Abdul informs Popatlal that the Gokuldham men are partying without him due to his single status. Popatlal then reveals the truth to the ladies about their husbands' clandestine party.

name: Champaklal Is Back
description: Popatlal and Mahila Mandal attempt to locate the Gokuldham men's party. Popatlal consults Abdul for information. Later, Purush Mandli's plans are disrupted by Champaklal's unexpected return.

name: Sharbat Ya Sharab?
description: The Purush Mandali plans an April Fool's prank on the Mahila Mandal and Popatlal. Despite their efforts, Popatlal remains suspicious. Later, the Mahila Mandal tests a drink to determine if it's alcohol or juice.

name: Prank Ulta Padh Gaya
description: Mahila Mandal and Champaklal pretend to be drunk to prank Purush Mandli, fooling Popatlal. Later, Purush Mandli gathers for soda and a discussion on global warming.

name: AC On Or Off?
description: Bagha informs Jethalal about an upcoming company visit for a new product launch. Jethalal wakes up Champaklal and Tapu, disrupting their sleep due to Tapu's AC preference conflicting with Champaklal's comfort.

name: Electrician Jethalal
description: Babita calls Iyer and complains about a fault in their AC. Jethalal offers to fix the AC when Iyer is unable to find a mechanic. Will he be able to fix the AC?

name: Babita Ka AC Karna Hai Repair
description: Jethalal, unable to repair Babita's air conditioner, tries calling Bagha for help, but Bawri intercepts the call and prevents him from speaking to Bagha.

name: Naya AC Lelo
description: Jethalal suggests Iyer and Babita to buy a new AC from his shop but Iyer is unsure about this. Will Iyer buy a new AC?

name: Iyer Ka Mazak
description: Jethalal is very happy that he helped Babita with her AC problem. Iyer plans a prank on Jethalal. Later, Madhavi prepares Bhideâ€™s favourite dish but Gokuldham kids eat it.

name: Tapu Prepares Breakfast
description: Sonu decides to treat Tapu. Tapu pleasantly surprises Jethalal with his favourite breakfast. Later, Jethalal ends up ditching Taarak to accompany Babita instead.

name: Jethalal Ki Important Meeting
description: Tapu goes to Sonu's house for a homemade mango milkshake. Meanwhile, Nattu Kaka and Bagha play the Bhide scooter game, earning a scolding from Jethalal. Later, Arjun from the Supervision company meets with Jethalal for business.

name: Bawri's Apology
description: Jethalal's business meeting goes wrong due to Bawri and Bagha's antics. Bawri tries to apologise to Jethalal, but he is not willing to accept. What will happen now?

name: Bawri Ki Entry Hui Band
description: Bawri offers an apology gift to Jethalal, but he refuses to accept it. Bagha warns Bawri not to come to Gada Electronics, but she vows to find a way to visit regardless of Jethalal's objections.

name: Bawri In Gada Electronics
description: Jethalal tells Taarak that if Bawri shows up at Gada Electronics today, he'll have to fire Bagha. Later, Bawri visits the store in disguise. Will Jethalal recognize her?

name: Warehoue Mein Kon Hai?
description: Bagha learns that Bawri has disguised herself and come to Gada Electronics. They talk in the warehouse. Will Jethalal catch them there?

name: Gokuldham Mein Hai Pooja
description: Bagha tells Bawri they can't meet secretly without Jethalal knowing. Taarak updates Anjali about Jethalal's concerns with Bawri and Bagha. Later, everyone assembles at Gokuldham society for the pooja.

name: Bawri In Disguise
description: Bawri sneaks into the shop in a disguise to meet Bagha, trying to keep their love story hidden from Jethalal. Can their romance survive the challenge of staying hidden from Jethalal's sharp eyes?

name: The Plan To Catch Bawri
description: Jethalal suspects that Bawri comes to the shop every day as a customer, and he plans to catch her red-handed. What will he do?

name: Bawri's New Attempt
description: Bagha prays that Bawri doesn't come to Gada Electronics but Jethalal is all set to welcome her. Will Bawri take the risk and enter Gada Electronics?

name: Jethalal Gets Arrested
description: Inspector Panday arrests Jethalal for misbehavior with a woman. Bagha tells Bawri it's because of her. Later, Taarak fakes illness at work to help Jethalal.

name: Permission Mil Gayi
description: Jethalal tells Bawri she caused him to go to jail. Bawri asks for permission to visit Bagha at Gada Electronics during quiet times. Later, Iyer threatens to reveal Jethalal's jail incident to Champaklal.

name: Husbands Ke Sath Shopping Jana Hai
description: Bhide and Madhavi get interrupted by Roshan during a sweet moment. Later, the wives discuss their husbands' food choices while buying vegetables and plan to go shopping together with their husbands.

name: Taarak Ko Chhutti Nahi Mil Rahi
description: As the ladies get ready for a shopping trip with their husbands, Taarak faces difficulty getting time off work. He asks the other husbands to skip shopping to avoid upsetting Anjali. Will they agree to help him out?

name: Taarak's Shopping Trip
description: Taarak arrives at the mall for the shopping trip. Later, Taarak's boss calls him to ask about the poem. What will Taarak do now?

name: Taarak's Boss In The Mall
description: All the couples go shopping together. Sodhi jokes with Taarak about Taarak's boss being at the mall, not realizing that Taarak's boss is actually there. What happens when Taarak's boss sees him?

name: Taarak Mall Mein Hai Ya Nahi?
description: Taarak's boss follows the Gokuldham men to ask about Taarak's whereabouts at the mall. The secretary suggests they may have seen someone else resembling Taarak. Later, Taarak's boss plans to send his secretary and a doctor to Taarak's house.

name: Taarak Ki Sundar Kavita
description: Dr. Hathi tells Dr. Chaddha that Taarak has a headache from not eating Anjali's diet food. Taarak's boss shares that his wife loved the poem he wrote. Later, the Gokuldham men swap tales about their wives' shopping experiences.

name: Traffic Bohot Hai
description: Jethalal and Bhide argue over a flowerpot. Champaklal asks Jethalal about his political views. Later, Iyer gives Jethalal and Taarak a ride, but they get stuck in traffic.

name: Konsa Neta Better Hai?
description: Jethalal strategizes to maintain his friendship with Chana Kumar without upsetting Kurmura Kumar. He discusses with Chana Kumar the complexities of openly supporting him. Meanwhile, Sunita confides her stress to the Mahila Mandal.

name: Chunaav Ka Mahol
description: Kurmura Kumar comes to Gokuldham for his election campaign. Popatlal tries to convince everyone to vote for Kurmura Kumar. Later, Sonu goes out of the house to make a delivery.

name: Sodhi Ka Sapna
description: Sodhi dreams that Bhide becomes extremely rich. Champaklal asks Tapu Sena to help the birds. Later, Bhide gets upset with Tapu Sena.

name: Summer Solutions
description: The members of Gokuldham society fight the summer heat together and get a brilliant idea to put water vessels all around for the animals and birds around.

name: Zaruratmand Ki Madad
description: Goli suggests taking a rickshaw, but everyone prefers to walk to Gokuldham society. Along the way, they come across workers labouring in the sun without water. Moved by this sight, they decide to assist the workers. How will they lend a helping hand?

name: Free Mein Buttermilk
description: Tapu Sena asks Roshan to make buttermilk for the workers, sparking Bhide's curiosity. Later, they set up a stall nearby and offer the buttermilk to the workers.

name: Tapu Sena Ke Acche Vichar
description: Roshan informs the Mahila Mandal about Tapu Sena's charitable efforts and offers assistance. A buttermilk vendor charges Popatlal for 30 glasses of buttermilk. Later, Taarak praises Tapu Sena's good deeds to Jethalal.

name: Tapu Sena's Stall
description: Chana Kumar arrives at Gada Electronics and gives Jethalal more packets of Sing Chana to distribute. Later, the police reprimands Tapu Sena for setting up their stall without permission.

name: Purush Mandli Ko Karni Hai Madad
description: The Tapu Sena receives praise for their good work and they pledge to continue their good work throughout the summer. Gokuldham members agree to share expenses for their buttermilk mission. Later, Purush Mandli brainstorm ways to contribute to the Tapu Sena's efforts.

name: Bina Mewa Kare Sabki Seva
description: Kurmura Kumar plans to take credit for Tapu Sena's work. Jethalal encounters issues with Chana Kumar. Later, others get inspired by Tapu Sena's good deeds.

name: Kurmura Kumar Ka Banner
description: Kurmura Kumar puts his party's banner at Tapu Sena's buttermilk stall, which worries Bhide as it may upset Chana Kumar and cause trouble. Removing the banner could also upset Kurmura Kumar. What will they decide to do next?

name: Banner Ki Tension
description: A reporter credits Kurmura Kumar for Tapu Sena's buttermilk stall. Chana Kumar blames Jethalal for supporting Kurmura Kumar and asks him to remove Kurmura Kumar's banner from the stall.

name: Kurmura Kumar Ki Pyaar Wali Dhamki
description: Chana Kumar asks Jethalal to convince the Gokuldham members to stop offering free buttermilk. Expecting Kurmura Kumar to oppose removing his banners, Chana is surprised by his unexpected reaction.

name: Chana Kumar's Suggestion
description: Gokuldham residents are split about removing the banner from the stall after Kurmura Kumar's threat. Later, Chana Kumar gives the residents a suggestion to deal with the problem.

name: Lemonade Vs Buttermilk
description: Kurmura Kumarâ€™s man asks other Gokuldham members to not help Jethalal and Taarak with the lemonade stall. Gokuldham residents are torn between Chana Kumar and Kurmura Kumar. Later, Jethalal and Taarak struggle to set up their lemonade stall.

name: Jethalal Ka Nimbu Paani Stall
description: Jethalal and Taarak call Bhide for help to find lemons. They struggle to find a rickshaw while Gokuldham members wait. Later, Jethalal sets up his lemonade stall.

name: Gokuldham Ho Gaya Hai Divide
description: Sodhi gets angry at Chana Kumar and Kurmura Kumar. Iyer drops the lemons while Tapu Sena feels bad about not helping Jethalal. Later, Kurmura Kumar's aide scolds the Gokuldham members for assisting Iyer when lemon juice gets in his eyes.

name: Dono Parties Mein Hua Jhagda
description: Kurmura Kumar urges Gokuldham not to close the buttermilk stall. Taarak's boss uncovers his lemonade sales lie. Tensions escalate as Kurmura Kumar and Chana Kumar's groups clash over the drinks, sparking a fight.

name: Jethalal Under Arrest
description: Inspector Pandey intervenes to resolve the issue between the two parties but his investigation uncovers evidence against Jethalal, leading to his arrest. Will the residents of Gokuldham stop his arrest?

name: Chana Kumar Ke Supporters
description: Sunita refuses to sell her vegetables in Gokuldham, as she is loyal to Chana Kumar. Meanwhile, a huge crowd gathers outside Gada Electronics, looking for freebies.

name: Problems Se Kaise Bache?
description: Gokuldham members face problems due to Kurmura Kumar and Chana Kumar. They decide to shut down the lemonade and buttermilk stall, but Champaklal opposes this.

name: Mission Paar Paar
description: Tapu Sena reviews the plan with everyone to avoid mistakes. Later, Bawri wishes them luck for "Mission Paar Paar," arousing the suspicion of Kurmura Kumar's and Chana Kumar's men.

name: Ganda Paani Ka Istamal
description: Kurmura Kumar and Chana Kumar work at the buttermilk and lemonade counters for publicity. Later, food officials shut down Chana Kumar's lemonade counter due to polluted water.

name: Kumura Aur Chana Fass Gaye
description: Two men drink buttermilk from the stall and faint. Rita reporter accuses Kurmura Kumar of using bad curd to make buttermilk. What will Kurmura Kumar do now?

name: Anjali Ka Juice
description: Taarak urgently calls everyone over, announcing Anjali made juice for them. They all try to avoid tasting it. Later, Abdul gets scolded by Jethalal and Champaklal in front of his friend.

name: Abdul Ki Duty
description: Abdul is busy running errands for the Gokuldham society members. Abdul's friend says that everyone is taking him for granted. Will Abdul listen to his advice?

name: Cake Gir Gaya
description: Abdul's friend tries to talk to him, but Abdul is always busy. Popatlal drops a cake and angrily blames Bhide for the society's poor maintenance.

name: Abdul Ki Value Nahi Hai?
description: Bhide scolds for not getting the pavement repaired. Later, Abdulâ€™s friend tells him that heâ€™s going abroad and tells him that Gokuldham members donâ€™t value him.

name: Abdul's Birthday
description: Abdul waits for birthday wishes, telling his friend the Purush Mandli will congratulate him at the office. Will they remember?

name: The Forgotten Birthday
description: Abdul feels sad when no one wishes him a happy birthday. Will they finally greet him or will he lose faith in his friends?

name: Poisoning Abdul's Mind
description: Abdul's friend tries to manipulate him, saying the colony uses him and nobody cares. Will Abdul fall prey to doubt and mistrust?

name: Bawri's Phone Call
description: Abdul asks to borrow Bhide's iron. Meanwhile, Bagha is unable to do his job properly as Bawri keeps calling him.

name: Bagha Needs A Holiday
description: Bawri asks Bagha to take a day off to celebrate their special day - the anniversary of the day they first met. But will Jethalal grant him a day off?

name: Bawri Ka Mantra
description: Bagha tells Bawri he can't get a holiday because Jethalal's 18 lakh rupees are stuck with PK Daruwala. Bawri suggests an idea to help Jethalal recover the money.

name: Daruwala Ka Phone Aa Gaya
description: Bagha is upset that Jethalal didn't give him a holiday. Mr. Daruwala, in Khandala, apologizes for the payment delay. Will Jethalal get his payment today?

name: Cheque Collect Karna Hai
description: Bagha and Bawri go to collect Jethalal's cheque, leaving him anxious. They arrive at Mr. Daruwala's resort. Will they get the cheque?

name: Cheque Ghum Gaya
description: Bagha and Bawri choose to celebrate their anniversary instead of heading back to Mumbai. Unfortunately, Bawri mistakenly misplaces Jethalalâ€™s cheque. What's their next move?

name: Bag Mili Ya Nahi?
description: Bawri suggests to Bagha that they should return to Mumbai and confess to Jethalal. They pray for guidance. What will happen next?

name: Installments Pe Phone
description: Bagha worries about Jethalal seeing Bawri at his shop, but she goes along anyway. Later, Jethalal finds out his son bought a phone from his shop.

name: Tapu Sena Ko Mila Invitation
description: Tapu Sena's talents are recognized with an invite to a gaming and animation conference in Pune. While everyone's bursting with pride, will everyone be allowed to go to Pune?

name: Tapu Sena Leaves For Pune
description: Tapu Sena heads to Pune for their conference, with parents and elders wishing them luck and safe travels. Popatlal wants to teach Bhide a lesson for leaving his scooter keys behind.

name: Sakharam Ki Chori
description: Popatlal plans to teach Bhide a lesson for his absent-mindedness. He hides Sakharam, Bhide's beloved scooter, in a hidden corner of the colony.

name: Pareshaan Popatlal
description: Gokuldham colony members are having fun at Abdul's shop when Popatlal arrives in a fancy car, looking worried and talking to a suspicious guy. Who could that mysterious man be?

name: Police Look For Popatlal
description: Inspector Pandey is trying to take Champaklal to the hospital but the society members react otherwise. Later, the police are looking for Popatlal but he is nowhere to be found. Where is Popatlal?

name: Popatlal Kaha Hai?
description: Inspector Pandey is on the lookout for Popatlal and searches for him everywhere. Will he be found?

name: On Popatlal's Trail
description: Inspector Pandey and all the members of Gokuldham colony are on the lookout for Popatlal but he is nowhere to be found. Where could he be?

name: Musibat Ki Jad - Popatlal
description: Inspector Pandey is searching for Popatlal in society while Popatlal is hiding in Bhide's house creating trouble for Bhide. What has Popatlal done and will Inspector Pandey find him?

name: Tension Mein Popatlal
description: After a frantic search, Popatlal is finally discovered locked in his closet. When asked about his disappearance, he opens up about the overwhelming stress and tension that had been building up inside him.

name: Popatlal Ke Liye Rishta
description: Everyone is relieved to see Popatlal so happy and relaxed. And to add to the excitement, a potential wedding opportunity is on the horizon! Will Popatlal finally tie the knot and start a new chapter in his life?

name: Popatlal Ki Kundli
description: Popatlal grows increasingly impatient as he awaits a phone call from Inspector Pandey to find out if his horoscope matches the girl's. How will Popatlal handle the suspense?

name: Big Day For Popatlal
description: Gokuldham colony waits for the bride's family to arrive. Will everything go well for Popatlal?

name: Popatlal Ki Kismat
description: Popatlal's wait may finally be over as he meets the girl and her family, accompanied by Inspector Pandey and his wife. Will this meeting seal the deal and lead to a long-awaited wedding?

name: Ladki Ka Decision
description: Inspector Pandey thoroughly questions Popatlal on several matters before revealing the bride's decision.

name: Last Chance For Popatlal
description: Popatlal's heart races as he prepares for his make-or-break meeting with his dream girl. He's determined to win her heart.

name: Popatlal's Date
description: Popatlal finally clears the air with his potential bride, laying all his cards on the table. But will his honesty pay off?

name: Popatlal Ko Kaise Sambhale?
description: The members of the Gokuldham Society are concerned for Popatlal since Madhubala has left him in limbo about her decision to marry him. How will they support him during this uncertain time?

name: Popatlal Ki Sagaai
description: Madhubala and her family meet with Popatlal and his friends to reveal their final decision on their potential union.

name: Engagement Ki Taiyyari
description: The entire colony is buzzing with excitement for Popatlal's engagement.

name: Popatlal Gets Anxious
description: Popatlal is both thrilled and anxious about his engagement ceremony. Will he be able to keep his nerves in check and make it through the big day without a hitch?

name: Popatlal's Engagement Day
description: It's Popatlal's engagement ceremony and everyone is excited. He hopes everything goes as planned. But will it all go smoothly, or will something unexpected happen?

name: Popatlal's Engagement Ceremony
description: Popatlal's engagement ceremony is coming up and everyone is eager to welcome his beautiful bride into the family. But will the big day go off without a hitch?

name: Popatlal Gayab Hain
description: Popatlal goes missing on his engagement day, and Inspector Pandey holds the Gokuldham members responsible. Where is Popatlal, and will he show up for his engagement?

name: Popatlal Ki Sagaai Tooti
description: Dr. Hathi drops a bombshell on Popatlal, revealing that he and Madhubala are both carriers of the rare genetic disorder, Thalassemia minor. The doctor warns that their marriage could lead to serious health complications.

name: Celebrating Tapu Sena
description: Tapu Sena returns from Pune, eager to celebrate their award with the entire colony. However, they're concerned that Popatlal might still be upset about his cancelled wedding and wonder how to approach him.

name: Kitty Party
description: The women of Gokuldham gather for a kitty party, eager to share laughter and conversation.

name: Surprise Haircut
description: All the women in Gokuldham society decide to surprise their husbands with a fresh haircut. How will the husbands react to this unexpected change in their looks?

name: Surprise For Bhide
description: Bhide receives a surprise from his wife and daughter as they unveil their new hair color. Later, Popatlal summons all the men of the colony to his house for an urgent matter.

name: Jethalal Ka Meetha Sapna
description: Jethalal believes he is dreaming when Champaklal tells him to go back to sleep instead of waking up. How will Jethalal react when he realizes this might not be just a dream?

name: Breakfast For Gokuldham
description: Dr. Hathi and his wife organize a grand special breakfast for the Gokuldham residents. They visit each house to ensure nobody eats before the surprise meal.

name: Banarasi Breakfast
description: Everyone eagerly anticipates the special Banarasi Breakfast organized by Dr. Hathi on Sunday. Will everything unfold smoothly as planned for this exciting event?

name: Bhide Looks For Popatlal
description: Bhide searches for Popatlal, convinced that Popatlal is playing a prank by hiding Sakharam.

name: Goli Kaha Hai?
description: Bhide searches for Sakharam and discovers that Goli has gone to get breakfast on Sakharam. Later, they find Sakharam crashed with no sign of Goli.

name: Goli And Sakharam Return
description: The colony members express concern about Goli and Sakharam's whereabouts to Inspector Pandey.

name: A Successful Breakfast
description: The colony members delight in the delicious breakfast organized by Dr. Hathi and celebrate Goli and Sakharam's return.

name: Celebrating Sweet 16 Years
description: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah celebrates 16 years of bringing laughter and joy to millions of viewers every day.

name: Bhide Ne Rakhi Shart
description: Bhide makes a daring challenge to the children - if he wins, they can no longer play in the compound, but if he loses, they will never be interrupted again.

name: Penalty Shoot Out
description: The colony members line up, each taking turns to shoot their penalty kicks, hoping to score the winning goal.

name: Roshan Ki Maangein
description: Roshan demands that Sodhi take her out for a movie, shopping, and restaurant since it's been days since they went out. Meanwhile, Bhide is concerned that everyone will not pay the maintenance fee on time.

name: Jethalal's Business Trip
description: Jethalal is getting ready for a work trip to Hyderabad and leaves the shop duties to his helpers. But, he tells Baagha to make sure Bawri stays away from the shop.

name: Early Morning Flight
description: Jethalal is anxious about oversleeping and missing his morning flight. He reaches out to his neighbours for help and companionship. Will anyone come to his aid?

name: Jethalal Needs A Ride
description: Jethalal thanks Iyer and Babita for their kindness and their decision to drive him to the airport for his flight. However, things take a sharp turn when he finds himself stranded with a punctured tire on a lonely street.

name: Jethalal Misses His Flight
description: Jethalal is upset because he missed his flight and fears that Bapuji will scold him. What will he do now?

name: Jethalal Returns
description: Jethalal returns to his shop after his flight is cancelled, surprising Nattu Kaka and Baagha.

name: Everything Is Booked
description: Jethalal, Bapuji, Iyer, and Babita find out that the restaurant is full. They call other options, but theyâ€™re all booked too. Can they find a place to eat?

name: Jal Hi Jeevan Hai
description: Bhide sets the quote of the day highlighting the importance of water. The question remains: will the colony members truly grasp the severity of the situation?

name: Ziddi Nalka
description: Bhide and his family head out in a cab, while Popatlal is waiting for the plumber. He receives a call asking him to get to the office as soon as possible. How will Popatlal handle the situation?

name: Tala Nahi Todne Denge
description: A plumber arrives at the colony, looking for Bhide, because he has forgotten his phone inside Bhide's house. However, the colony children refuse to let the plumber break the lock and instead, ask him to wait.

name: Chaabi Kaha Hai?
description: The plumber's frustration reaches a boiling point as the keys to the lock remain nowhere to be found in Gokuldham. Meanwhile, Taarak's boss faces a similar predicament, losing his keys as well.

name: Chaabi Wale Ko Bulao
description: The situation in Gokuldha becomes chaotic as the plumber loses his temper and threatens to break Bhide's lock. However, Abdul suggests breaking the lock. Can the key maker resolve the issue?"

name: Bholaram's Anniversary
description: Bholaram is distraught that his entire day has been ruined by searching for the keys. Meanwhile, his wife Sushma arrives in Gokuldham colony. Will the colony members be able to make amends and turn his day around?

name: Ravivaar Ka Plan
description: Bhide is thrilled about his Sunday plan to enjoy Kothimbir Vadi with his family. However, a series of unexpected events throws a wrench in his plans.

name: Abdul Kaha Hain?
description: Goli is eager to get some amchur powder, but Abdul's shop remains closed. Later, Tapu Sena informs the members of the society that Abdul hasn't shown up yet. Where could Abdul be?

name: Paani Khatam
description: Popatlal is furious when the water stops mid-shower. He storms down and blames Bhide for the inconvenience.

name: Abdul Kaha Hai?
description: The residents of Gokuldham colony are worried because Abdul is nowhere to be found. They search for him at his house and all the places he usually visits, but there is no sign of him.

name: Abdul Ki Udhaari
description: The colony members find out that Abdul owes some people money, and they have come to collect it. Maybe that's why he has been hiding for a few days.

name: Abdul Ki Waapsi
description: Everyone is expecting Inspector Pandey to find Abdul and bring him back. However, Pandey Ji is coming back empty-handed and Abdul is nowhere to be found.

name: Abdul Ki Majboori
description: Abdul's return brings relief to the colony, but he keeps his financial struggles to himself. Despite his cheerful reunion, Abdul is secretly desperate and decides to sell his shop, abandoning his life in the colony.

name: Abdul Ki Tension
description: Dr. Hathi mentions to all the men that Abdul has seemed different ever since he returned. What could be troubling Abdul?

name: Abdul Ke Dukaan Pe Sale
description: Abdul, desperate for money and on the verge of selling his shop, offers a 50% discount to colony members without disclosing the true reason behind his sale.

name: Abdul's Urgency
description: Jethalal checks in on Nattu Kaka and Baagha to ensure the shop is running smoothly in his absence. Meanwhile, Abdul is frantically trying to sell off all the goods to raise the money he desperately needs.

name: Tapu Sena Investigates
description: Tapu Sena is intrigued by Abdul's mysterious behaviour and decides to get to the bottom of it. They confront him, demanding to know the real reason behind his sudden decision to sell everything at a whopping 50% discount.

name: Spying On Abdul
description: The Tapu Sena installs a listening device to monitor Abdul's activities, but they feel uneasy about their decision.

name: Abdul Ki Dukaan
description: The news that Abdul is attempting to sell his shop sends shockwaves through the colony, leaving all its members stunned and concerned.

name: Abdul Ka Udhaar
description: Abdul opens up about his troubles to the members of the Gokuldham Society, who immediately offer to lend him money, but he graciously declines their help. How will Abdul manage to clear his debts on his own?

name: Abdul's Last Janmashtami
description: The colony is reeling in disbelief as Abdul prepares to sell his shop and bid farewell. The thought of this being his last festival among them is unbearable. Will Abdul reconsider his decision?

name: All Eyes On The Matki
description: Tapu Sena is confident that they will emerge victorious in the Dahi Handi celebrations and successfully break the Matki. However, the colony members are worried about their chances.

name: Tapu Sena Find A Loophole
description: Tapu Sena is thrilled to participate in the Dahi Handi competition but faces disappointment when they're unable to register.

name: Matki Kaun Phodega?
description: Tapu Sena is eager to participate in the competition, but their rivals mock them due to their lack of practice and experience. Can Tapu Sena prove their doubters wrong?

name: Bal Gopal Gokuldham Group
description: The spotlight shines bright on Tapu Sena as they prepare to take on the ultimate challenge of cracking the Matki. With the entire family and neighbourhood on edge, can they pull it off?

name: Abdul Ki Kahaani
description: Abdul discloses the real reason behind selling his shop to the Gokuldham residents. Will they stand by him in this decision?

name: Too Many Customers
description: Tapu Sena helps Abdul save his shop by winning the Dahi Handi competition and securing the necessary funds. Meanwhile, Jethalal struggles to manage the shop on his own due to the absence of Nattu Kaka and Bagha.

name: Ganpati Decorations
description: The women of Gokuldham want to take charge of the Ganpati decorations and propose their idea to the colony members.

name: Mahila Mandal's Decoration Planning
description: The women of Gokuldham are thrilled to welcome Bappa and have taken charge of all the decorations. However, they want to keep their decoration idea a secret from everyone.

name: Decoration Ka Theme Kya Hai?
description: The men in the colony are eager to know the theme the women have chosen for the Ganpati celebrations, but their wives are tight-lipped about it.

name: Decoration Ka Suspense
description: All the men try different ways to uncover the secrets and learn the theme of the decoration. Meanwhile, Tapu Sena's rivals are envious that Gokuldham's decoration video went viral and decide to sabotage their next Ganpati celebration.

name: Gokuldham Mein Aaye Pehelwaan
description: During the Ganapati celebration at Gokuldham Society, Olympic medalist Aman Sehrawat makes a special appearance, accompanied by Asit Modi.

name: Bappa Ke Darshan
description: Gokuldham colony is abuzz with festive spirit as people throng to visit Bappa and admire the beautiful decorations created by the colony's women. Olympic medalist Aman Sehrawat's special visit adds to the excitement,

name: Devotion Towards Bappa
description: The actors from Kahan Shuru Kahan Khatam visit Gokuldham, inviting residents to watch their film. Later, the community opens the 'Daan Peti'. What will they find inside?

name: Ikkis Lakh Ka Cheque
description: Shock and excitement erupt in the colony as members discover a staggering donation cheque tucked away in the 'Daan Peti'.

name: Cheque Ka Kya Karein?
description: The colony members are shocked, excited, and perplexed about what to do with the enormous donation. They wonder if it's genuine or fake, who the donor is, and whether they should investigate further.

name: Bank Manager Se Mulaqat
description: All the colony members gather to meet the bank manager and discuss what to do with the cheque. What will the manager say?

name: Ganpati Celebrations Ka Cheque
description: Bhide, Iyer, and Jethalal are thrilled after receiving a cheque worth twenty-one lakhs for Ganpati celebrations, unaware that it's all part of a setup. What unexpected events will unfold next?

name: Zaroorat Mand Bacche
description: With the donated money in hand, the colony launches a search for worthy students who need financial support to pursue their educational dreams. Will their efforts lead them to the right children?

name: Young Minds Unite
description: Gokuldham Society extends an invitation to all prospective candidates to attend the selection process for their scholarship program.

name: Vicky Ki Saajish
description: The rivals of Tapu Sena are over the moon after convincingly tricking the Gokuldham colony members into thinking they've received a massive donation. The members are already celebrating and have announced scholarships for the kids. But will they catch on before things get out of hand?

name: A Big Shock For Gokuldham
description: The colony members are shocked and disappointed when they learn that the cheque for the scholarships has been voided and payment has been stopped. What will they do now?

name: Vicky Ki Marzi
description: The colony members are left stunned and shocked, unsure of how to proceed, after Vicky refuses to make the payment and bluntly tells them that he has changed his mind.

name: Bappa Se Prarthana
description: Abdul informs the society members that Rita Reporter is arriving in the colony with her cameramen. With Vicky still withholding the funds, Bhide and the other members are left wondering how they will manage to handle the situation.

name: Gokuldham Society Ki Badnaami
description: The colony members are torn about how to address the scholarship situation, and they're considering being transparent about what really happened. Will they muster the courage to come clean?

name: Paiso Ka Bandobast
description: The colony members are overjoyed when Tapu Sena reveals that the funds have been secured. But how did they miraculously come up with the money?

name: Sarva Pitru Amavasya
description: The entire colony comes together to prepare traditional food and make elaborate arrangements for the Sarva Pitru Amavasya ritual, a sacred ceremony to honour and pay respect to beloved ancestors.

name: Discount Dilemma
description: Jethalal struggles to sell his electronics as online markets and malls, with their enticing discounts, continue to dominate the market. Will he be able to find a solution to overcome these challenges?

name: Gada Electronics Ki Nayi Scheme
description: Jethalal meets with Nattu Kaka and Bagha to discuss new ideas for increasing sales at Gada Electronics. Will they come up with a plan?"

name: Celebrity At Gada Electronics
description: Jethalal, Nattu Kaka, and Bagha eagerly await the arrival of a special celebrity at Gada Electronics. Who is the celebrity?

name: Garba Practice
description: Gokuldham colony is abuzz with Navratri excitement. As the community comes together to perfect their Garba steps, but will the celebrations unfold smoothly, or will unexpected twists and turns add a dash of drama to the festivities?

name: Bhide Falls Sick
description: The colony members are excited about Navratri celebrations and decide to start planning the decorations. But with Bhide falling sick suddenly, who will take up the charge?

name: Navratri Decorations
description: Tapu Sena contacts the mandap decorator, but he refuses the job. Undeterred, they reach out to another decorator. Will they succeed in managing the wedding arrangements without Bhide's guidance?

name: Confronting Danav
description: The Mahila Mandal visits Danavâ€™s home and offers support to his wife. Later, they confront Danav directly. What will be the result of their bold stand?

name: Mahila Mandal Ki Meeting
description: Decorations for the event in Gokuldham are underway. Meanwhile, the Mahila Mandal calls for an urgent meeting involving all society members. What could be the pressing issue behind this sudden gathering?

name: Dushman Ka Dushman Dost Hota Hain
description: Bhide attempts to contact other decorators, but they all refuse due to the society's conflict with Danav. Later, Popatlal introduces a new decorator named Raka Tabla. Will he step in to assist the members with the Navratri decorations?

name: Danav Ki Complaint
description: The ladies of Gokuldham go to the police station to file a complaint against Danav, who beats his wife at home. Will Inspector Pandey be able to help with this situation?

name: Danav Ki Dhamki
description: Danav dares the Gokuldham colony members to finish the decorations, saying heâ€™ll only help if they apologize. How will the colony members handle this situation?

name: Danav's Revenge
description: Everyone in Gokuldham is thrilled about the Navratri celebrations, but Danav is determined to take revenge and ruin their festivities. Will he succeed in his plans?

name: Saving Danav's Life
description: Danav's wife rushes in to inform the colony members that Danav is in danger. What has happened to him, and will the colony members decide to help?

name: Ravan Dahan In Gokuldham
description: The colony members are excited to get back to their festivities and dance Garba. Will the celebrations continue without any trouble until Raavan Dahan?

name: Japan Ki Special Strawberry
description: Anjali invites Jethalal and Champaklal over for a strawberry milkshake. Later, Taarak's boss inquires about his Bade Guruji, putting Taarak in a tricky situation.

name: Taarak's Day Off
description: Taarak is excited to learn that his boss will be on leave for two days, prompting him to plan some quality time with Anjali. Will his plans go smoothly?

name: Boss Se Chutkara
description: Taarak is pleased to have time off from work due to his boss's absence. However, the other employees are now demanding the same. Will Taarak grant their request?

name: Taarak Ko Ho Rahi Tension
description: Taarak is anxious, fearing his boss's reaction if it's revealed that the whole office was on break. Could this cost him his job?

name: Bade Guruji Se Mulaqat
description: Taarakâ€™s boss insists that he organise a meeting with Bade Guruji. Will he manage to make it happen?

name: Bapuji Ko Kaise Manaye?
description: Taarak worries about how to get Bapuji to play the role of Bade Guruji for his boss. Can he convince him to go along with it?

name: Taarak Ki Chinta
description: Champaklal is irritated with Jethalal for agreeing to Taarakâ€™s request and decides not to take on the role of Bade Guruji. How will Taarak handle this setback?

name: Bade Guruji Ke Saath Mulaqat
description: Taarak worries whether Bapuji will make it in time to pose as Bade Guruji for Varun. Will everything go smoothly with their pretend meeting?

name: Guruji's Double Trouble
description: Taarak and his friends are stumped on how to arrange a meeting between Varun, his boss, and Bade Guruji, especially since Varun is already acquainted with Bapuji. Can they find a fake Bade Guruji in time to pull off the charade?

name: Boss Aur Guruji Ki Meeting
description: Taarak finally manages to dress up Popatlal as Bade Guruji, preparing him to meet Varun, the bossâ€™s son. Will Taarakâ€™s elaborate plan succeed, or will they get caught?

name: Bade Guruji Ka Parda Faash
description: Varun and his father seek Bade Guruji's blessings in separate encounters. Will they uncover Taarak's elaborate scheme?

name: Diwali Ki Taiyyari
description: With enthusiasm high, the colony members make grand arrangements for Diwali. But will the festivities go smoothly?

name: Sarees For Mahila Mandal
description: Champaklal invites the Mahila Mandal to his home and gifts them sarees for Diwali. Meanwhile, the men of Gokuldham gather at Abdul's shop. Later, Bhide makes an announcement about distributing free firecrackers to all society members.

name: Free Patakhe
description: Tapu Sena suggests a collective purchase of firecrackers for everyone in the colony. But will the colony members be on board with this plan?

name: Allrounder Patakha
description: Jethalal acquires a super firecracker and canâ€™t wait to show it off to the colony members. Will this firecracker live up to the hype, or will it fizzle out?

name: Patakha Panic
description: Jethalalâ€™s convinced that Allrounder Patakha is going to flop, and heâ€™s worried about losing everything. Is he overthinking it, or is there something to his fear?

name: Allrounder Patakha's Final Test
description: The Gokuldham members are thrilled about the Allrounder Patakha and hold a lucky draw to decide who will get to light it. But will it go off with a bang, or turn out to be a dud?

name: Life After Diwali
description: The excitement of Diwali fades, leaving the colony members feeling empty. As they try to fill the void, they begin to look for new adventures and challenges to take on.

name: Jethalal Ki Exercise
description: Champaklal encourages Jethalal to work out at home. Meanwhile, Bagha and Nattu Kaka devise a plan to attract more customers to the shop.

name: Surprise Trip
description: Feeling restless in Gokuldham, Tapu Sena decides itâ€™s time for an exciting getaway. Bapuji, noticing their eagerness, hints at the perfect destination where theyâ€™re sure to have a blast but keeps the location a secret.

name: Old Is Gold
description: Bapuji surprises Tapu Sena with a secret trip, building their excitement to a peak. But how will they react when they discover the destination is an old age home?

name: Fun At The Old Age Home
description: While Tapu Sena and Bapuji bond with the senior citizens at the old age home, Jethalal and his friends grow increasingly worried. Will they be able to find out where theyâ€™ve gone?

name: Dairy Strike
description: The milkmenâ€™s strike leaves the colony struggling to get their basic daily supplies. How will the residents manage without milk?

name: Morning Chai
description: Gokuldham Colony faces a crisis as the milk supply runs dry, leaving everyone without their beloved morning chai. Later, Bhide struggles to decide whether to repair his fridge or replace it.

name: Bhide's Fridge Repair
description: Jethalal gets frustrated with Bagha because Bawri keeps visiting the shop repeatedly. Later, Bagha heads to Bhide's house to repair his fridge.

name: Fridge Ka Sauda
description: Bhide unknowingly strikes a deal to sell his fridge to a scrap dealer for a shockingly low price. Just in time, Jethalal steps in to stop the sale and tries to help Bhide secure a much better offer. Will Jethalalâ€™s intervention save the day?

name: Jethalal Ke Liye Sunahara Mauka
description: After successfully delivering the fridge to the businessman, Jethalal is presented with an enticing offer to acquire more old fridges of the same brand for a generous reward.

name: Cooling King Ka Offer
description: Jethalal faces difficulty finding old fridges in scrap shops and comes up with an exchange offer to acquire Cooling King brand fridges.

name: Mega Exchange Offer
description: Jethalal's social media campaign quickly gains traction, attracting a lot of attention. His tempting offer seems too good to be true and other businessmen start to wonder what the catch is.

name: Jethalal Ki Khushi
description: Jethalal successfully acquires all the fridges and is overjoyed. Later, a businessman arrives at Gada Electronics to finalize the deal. How will this transaction unfold?

name: Jethalal Ki Duvidha
description: Jethalal finds himself in a dilemma with old fridges cluttering his shop just as a new shipment of fridges is about to arrive. How will he handle the situation?

name: Macchar Problem
description: Baagha struggles with the mosquito problem as he and Nattu Kaka look after the fridges overnight, waiting for them to be transferred.

name: What To Do With The Fridges?
description: Jethalal is concerned about the fridges lying around in the colony with no sign of anyone coming to collect them. What explanation will the businessman give when Jethalal calls him?

name: Jethalal Ke Saath Fraud
description: Jethalal goes to the police station to file a complaint against the businessman who scammed him. Will Inspector Pandey be able to help him?

name: Dunkiwala Ko Kaise Pakde?
description: Jethalal and his neighbours are increasingly worried as they struggle to trace Dunkiwala, the businessman who deceived Jethalal. Will they find a way to catch him?

name: Dunkiwala Ke Saath Meeting
description: Jethalal and his friends arrange a meeting with Dunkiwala, hoping to catch him red-handed. Will their plan succeed?

name: Dunkiwala Ka Fraud
description: Upon discovering that Babu Bakkal is actually Dunkiwala, Jethalal flees from his men, taking the money with him. Will he get caught?

name: Sodhi's Party Plans
description: Sodhi is overjoyed about his friend's visit from Punjab for his birthday. Will Roshan give him the green light for a celebration?

name: Paratha Party
description: Roshan refuses to allow Sodhi to throw a party for his friends visiting from out of town and suggests a paratha party instead.

name: No Party Sharty
description: Roshan hesitates to give Sodhi permission for his party, but his friends promise he will behave. Will she agree?

name: Harmeetâ€™s Party
description: Sodhi brings Bhide and Popatlal along for Harmeetâ€™s birthday to ensure he doesnâ€™t drink. But will the two manage to resist temptation themselves?

name: Cheers Or Not?
description: Harmeet tries to trick Sodhi into drinking, but Popatlal and Bhide make sure to keep him in check. Will Harmeet succeed in getting Sodhi tipsy during his birthday celebrations?

name: Sodhi Ki Party-Sharty
description: Popatlal and Bhide manage a drunken Sodhi, while Roshan anxiously waits at home. Will Sodhi be allowed into the house?

name: Bhide Seeks Jethalal's Help
description: Bhide and Popatlal turn to Jethalal for help in managing a drunken Sodhi. Just as Jethalal is about to leave home, Champaklal catches him. Will this land Jethalal in trouble?

name: Taarak Ka Idea
description: The men of Gokuldham rally together to help Bhide and Popatlal manage a drunken Sodhi. They turn to Taarak, hoping he can come up with a plan to get Sodhi safely back to Gokuldham. What solution will Taarak devise?

name: Anjali Ki Dosti
description: Anjali learns the truth about how the men of the colony lied to Roshan Bhabhi to save Sodhi after his party-sharty. Will she expose their lies?

name: Sodhi Confesses
description: Anjaliâ€™s plan succeeds, and Sodhi finally admits to his wife about his party-sharty and how the men of the colony made up an excuse to protect him. How will she respond?

name: Permission To Party
description: Jethalal grows increasingly worried about his son's future now that heâ€™s grown up. Meanwhile, Tapu Sena seeks Bhideâ€™s permission to let Sonu attend a late-night party.

name: Baccho Ka Bhavishya
description: Bhide and the others grow anxious about their children's future and upcoming marriage proposals. Later, Bhide becomes particularly concerned when he finds Sonu's phone switched off.

name: Sonu Runs Late
description: Bhide is on edge, worried that Sonu and Tapu Sena haven't returned from the party. He decides to take matters into his own hands and heads out to check on them.

name: Sonu Ki Chinta
description: Bhideâ€™s concern for Sonu grows as he struggles with his distrust of Tapu and his desire to find her a suitable match quickly. How will he handle the pressure of having a growing daughter?

name: Shaadi Ki Umr
description: Bhide is concerned about Sonuâ€™s friendship with Tapu, fearing it might blossom into love. How will he come to terms with the fact that his daughter is now grown up and capable of making her own decisions?

name: Bhide Ki Jaldbaazi
description: Worried about Sonu and Tapu's growing friendship, Bhide decides to speed up his search for a groom for Sonu. Meanwhile, Bapuji starts looking for a bride for Tapu.

name: Suitable Groom For Sonu
description: Bhide calls in an acquaintance to help arrange Sonuâ€™s marriage. How will she react when she finds out?

name: Shaadi Pressure
description: Jethalal and Champaklal attempt to persuade Tappu to consider marriage, but he firmly refuses. Meanwhile, Sonu faces similar pressure from her parents. How will the duo manage to decline their elders' expectations?

name: Shaadi Ka Darr
description: As their families begin the search for suitable life partners, Sonu and Tapu find themselves in a state of panic. Desperate to avoid arranged marriages, will they be able to come up with a plan?

name: Tapu's Wedding Woes
description: Tapu is growing increasingly anxious as the pressure to get married mounts, but he's running out of creative excuses to dodge the issue. Will he find a clever way to wriggle out of it?

name: Tapu And Sonu Hire An Actor
description: Tapu and Sonu come up with a plan to hire an actor to help them avoid getting married. But will their plan work?

name: Mission Shaadi Atkao
description: Tapu and Sonu convince the actor to help them in this situation. Will their plan work out?

name: Chotelal Ki Bhavishyavaani
description: Chotelal, disguised as an astrologer, advises Bhide to stop worrying about Sonu's marriage now, in an attempt to help Sonu escape the situation. Will Bhide be convinced?

name: Popatlal's Suspense
description: Popatlal keeps the Gokuldham men in suspense about his plans. Meanwhile, a father and son visit Gada Electronics to purchase a phone.

name: Rahsyamai Meeting
description: Everyone is eager about Popatlal's huge announcement that will either shake or break their world.

name: Popatlal's Huge Announcement
description: As restlessness grows, Popatlal gears up to reveal his much-awaited announcement in the clubhouse.

name: Sabki Bhavishyavaani
description: Popatlal uses artificial intelligence to predict everyone's future and reads them out one by one. What surprises and revelations await them?

name: Bapuji's Future
description: While Popatlal eagerly shares everyoneâ€™s future, he hesitates when it comes to Bapuji. What could he be hiding?

name: Gokuldham New Year Celebration
description: In Gokuldham, everyone gets ready to welcome the New Year with elaborate celebrations and great enthusiasm.

name: Secret Surprise
description: The Gokuldham members ring in the New Year with great enthusiasm and excitement. Meanwhile, each of them secretly prepares unique balloon surprises for the celebration.

name: Ek Nayi Shuruaat
description: Everyone in Gokuldham Colony celebrates and welcomes the New Year with great excitement and festive spirit.

name: Bapuji Ki Udaan
description: Bapuji gets the opportunity to release the balloon to kick-start the New Year, but things take an unexpected turn when he ends up floating away with the balloons. Will the others manage to bring him down in time?

name: Bapuji's Balloon Adventure
description: Bapuji drifts across the city, carried by balloons, as the colony members race to catch up and figure out how to bring him back down. Will they manage to rescue him?

name: Bapuji Ko Kaise Utaare?
description: The colony members panic as they struggle to figure out how to bring Bapuji down. With Inspector Pandey stepping in, can they find a way?
